apps.title: DHgate-Online Wholesale Stores
apps.developer: Digital Trading Science & Technology (Beijing) Co. Ltd.
apps.description:
The DHgate shopping app allows free access to the DHgate wholesale marketplace on the go – connecting you directly to wholesale sellers and getting you the best prices available.



The DHgate app provides one-stop solution for your online purchasing, from international logistics and payment, to internet finance and customer services. DHgate app features over a million Chinese wholesalers, 40 million products for sale and has amassed 10 million buyers from 230 countries and regions.



We provide the easiest and most cost effective all-in-one solution for your business. We enable anyone to buy and sell products in wholesale price globally by providing secure payment services, logistics solutions, escrow protection services, and internet financing.



With a variety of over 20 million products in categories ranging from electronics to wedding dresses and from cosmetics to furniture – you’ll never miss what you’re looking for. Simply tell the app whether you’re buying for wholesale or personal use, choose your favorite categories and receive personalized discounts and recommendations.



DHgate Shopping APP Features:

• Secure, organized and reliable mobile platform.

• Shop directly from sellers and enjoy lower-than-retail prices.

• Check daily deals to find new discount products every day.

• Make purchases individually or in bulk (for additional discounts).

• Filter and customize to find the perfect product.

• Get smart product recommendations based on preferences and browsing history.

• Read customer reviews for insight on any product.

• Pay using innovative and easy payment options.

• Ship using worldwide delivery on most products.

• Scan QR codes to jump straight to a product’s page.

• Shop at the $1.99 store for the best discounts.

• Join the VIP club to receive exclusive benefits including 24/7 customer support and more.

• Redeem seasonal promotions for coupons on all your favorite seasonal items.



Shopping Categories Include:

• Electronics

• Cellphones

• Apparel & Clothing

• Home & Garden

• Jewelry

• Fashion Accessories

• Watches

• Toys & Hobbies

• Shoes

• And much, much more!



Whether you’re an entrepreneur making a bottom line or just a savvy consumer looking for the best deals, the DHgate app offers the value you need at the prices you want.



Quick Facts for DHgate Shopping APP

• Approximately 1.2 million sellers globally

• 10 million enterprise and individual buyers from over 230 countries and regions 

• 33 million wholesale and retail product listingsA transaction every 3 seconds

• Multilingual Sales: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish

• Our Partners: American Express, DHL, FedEx, MasterCard, Visa, UPS



Download DHgate app and discover the best prices on clothes, electronics, shoes and more!

apps.title: Best Buy: Tech Deals & Savings
apps.description:
Get the best deals on appliances, electronics and more at Best Buy. We’ve simplified tech shopping, with warp-speed checkout, Curbside Pickup, limited runs, and can't-miss deals. Whether you’re in the market for the latest gadgets, electronics or essential appliances, Best Buy provides everything you need at your fingertips.

Find shopping deals and sales on everything you need. Best Buy is your ultimate deal finder, making sure you get what you need at the best prices. We've got tech surprises in all sizes. View ratings and reviews as you browse our huge selection of today's top tech and toys.

Shop from home or enhance your in-store experience. Pick up in store, or have your order delivered to your car through Curbside Pickup. You can use the app to let us know you're on the way, and we'll have it ready. Wondering how it’ll look in your space? AR before you buy, right from the app.

From cutting-edge tech to essential home appliances, explore today’s top products:
•	Smart TVs, laptops and gaming consoles
•	Kitchen appliances, blenders and coffee makers
•	Home security systems and smart home devices
•	Headphones, speakers and soundbars
•	and much more!

Deal finder & sales
•	Find sales on electronics, gadgets and appliances
•	Deal of the day comes with huge savings on the latest tech
•	Get exclusive shopping deals with a My Best Buy membership
•	Deal Alerts: Receive real-time notifications about the best sales on appliances, electronics, and must-have gadgets.

Shop with the best experience
•	24/7 Access: Shop for electronics and appliances anytime, anywhere, right from your device.
•	Augmented reality: Visualize how products will fit in your space using our AR feature before you buy.
•	Curbside convenience: Enjoy fast curbside pickup by notifying us when you're on your way and we’ll have your order ready.
•	Order tracking: Stay informed with real-time tracking for all your orders and deliveries.

Appliances from top brands
•	Shop major appliances for the kitchen, washers & dryers, vacuums and more
•	Appliance parts and accessories help make updating and maintaining a breeze
•	Shop from top brands 

Electronics for Everything
•	We have the electronics you need at the best price
•	Find sales on the latest tech for home, auto, and everything in between
•	Shop from major brands 

Get all the details. Browse products available now at stores near you. Track orders and deliveries. Scan and shop. And find nearby service options and store details — including popular times to shop.

Get it all with the gotta-have app for gotta-have tech.

apps.title: Poshmark: Buy & Sell Fashion
apps.description:
THE SMART, SIMPLE, AND SUSTAINABLE WAY TO SHOP AND SELL.
Poshmark is the leading marketplace for secondhand style—where real people turn closets into cash and discover deals from over 10,000+ brands across 90+ categories. From fashion to home and everything in between, it’s the easiest way to shop and sell with impact. This future of fashion is here. 

SHOP SMARTER
Explore fresh finds across fashion, beauty, home, pets, and more—up to 70% off retail. Whether you're into vintage gems, everyday staples, or trending brands like SKIMS, Nike, Free People, and Louis Vuitton, Poshmark is where style and savings meet. Shopping sustainable has never felt this seamless or this fun.

SELL IN SECONDS
Got items you're ready to let go of? Use Smart List AI to list them in just a few taps. It writes your title, fills in the details, and gets your listing ready in seconds—just snap a pic and go. Whether you're cleaning out your closet or going after your next big thing, it’s the easiest way to turn what you’re not wearing into something new.

GIVE STYLE A SECOND LIFE 
Over 350 million items have been recirculated on Poshmark—and every one makes a difference. When you buy or sell secondhand, you're helping reduce fashion waste and supporting a more sustainable way to shop. It’s better for your closet and the planet.

GREAT DEALS, ZERO DOUBT.
Every order on Poshmark is protected by Posh Protect, so you can shop stress-free. Secure payments, tracked shipping, and support if anything goes wrong—because getting great deals shouldn’t come with second guesses.

WHERE PEOPLE AND STYLE GO LIVE
Poshmark isn’t just a marketplace—it’s a community. Follow your favorite closets, shop live with Posh Shows, and join themed Posh Parties happening every day. Whether you’re cleaning out your closet or curating a whole new vibe—there’s space for it all.
So go ahead—download the app and start to fashion your dreams.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING
“One of the best-known and highest-rated apps among online thrifting apps, Poshmark claims the "best overall" title because it has the most robust product offerings, generous return program and easiest user experience. You can buy or list pretty much any item of clothing on Poshmark -- it includes sections for women, men, children and pets, along with electronics, home goods, beauty and wellness and, bonus points, a dedicated section for plus sizes going up to 5X.” (CNET)

“Poshmark is getting it right. The site manages to mirror the polished e-commerce experience shoppers have come to expect. It’s easier to list items, information is presented in visually appealing ways and complex search tools make discovery easier.” (Forbes)

“If you’re looking for a bargain but is as equally great for the environment, Poshmark is a second-hand marketplace that sells the trendiest new and used clothing and accessories.” (ELLE Canada)

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Snap. Search. Score. Discovering your favorite styles is now easier than ever with Visual Intelligence.
• We’ve squashed a few pesky bugs to keep your experience smooth and seamless.

apps.title: Costco
apps.description:
It's easy to save time and money while on the go, with the Costco Mobile App! We've improved our mobile app, to make it easier for members to access the incredible values found only at Costco.

DIGITAL MEMBERSHIP CARD: Access your membership card from the home page of the app. Use your membership card to enter the warehouse and at checkout.
 
SHOP: Browse Costco.com’s unique and expanded selection, which offers thousands of items not found at your local warehouse. Enjoy having items delivered straight to your door!
 
SAVINGS: Conveniently receive the latest Warehouse Savings right on your own device.

GAS PRICES: Just tap the locator pin on the map to view current gas prices.
 
PHOTOS: Order metal prints, acrylic prints or photo mugs directly from the app.  Have them delivered to your door or pick them up at select Costco locations.

SPECIAL EVENTS: View the Special Events happening at your local Costco and set reminders for upcoming events.

PHARMACY: Order prescription refills & check status on prescriptions. Get refill reminders, track your medications, manage family accounts, transfer prescriptions, and find a Costco pharmacy.
 
TRAVEL: Shop Costco Travel for great deals on vacation packages, hotels, cruises, rental cars, theme parks and more!
 
BUSINESS CENTER: Stock up on everything from Restaurant Supplies to Office Essentials, and keep your business running smoothly and efficiently.
 
SHOPPING LIST: Keep track of the items you want to pick up on your next trip to Costco.

apps.title: Mercari: Buying & Selling App
apps.description:
MEET MERCARI: a marketplace built for you. Sell quick and save big all in one, top-rated marketplace. With 1000s of new and used items dropping daily, millions are shopping and selling on the Mercari marketplace. From clothing to collectibles, vintage Valentino to new Nintendo, find deals at up to 70% off retail.

DESIGNED TO HELP SELLERS SUCCEED
- Earn money decluttering unused items or start a side hustle
- List in seconds – sell collectibles, once-loved clothing, toys, vintage, electronics, trading cards, makeup and antiques
- Get your stuff seen and sold fast with millions of shoppers and tools like Promote and Offer to Likers
- Get paid quickly with Instant Pay or direct deposit. You can also use your Mercari balance to fund your next find
- Sell securely with ratings, reviews and Seller Protection

DISCOVER DEALS FROM TRUSTED SELLERS
- Thrift clothes, collectibles, antiques, unique handmade items, one-of-a-kind treasures, pre-loved pieces and more
- Find what you’re looking for at a great price
- Shop new, like-new, used and sale items
- Discover hidden finds you can’t shop at retail – from limited edition to one-of-a-kind treasures
- Get notified of price drops and exclusive offers from sellers
- Pricing is flexible so you can shop within budget. Make offers to negotiate prices on your favorite finds
- Bundle items to ship in one package and save on shipping


MERCARI IS THE COMMUNITY MARKETPLACE THAT WORKS FOR YOU. SHOP MERCARI TO SAVE MONEY, GET AMAZING DEALS AND DISCOVER UNIQUE & VINTAGE ITEMS!

MERCARI FEATURES:

A HAUL OF GREAT BRANDS
Shop clothing, shoes, and more from top brands including:
- Lululemon, Athleta and Vuori athletic apparel
- Nike, Adidas and Jordan sneakers
- Apple, Sony and Microsoft devices

FAVORITES FROM NICHE BRANDS
- Tamashii Nations, Funko and Sonny Angel figurines
- Loungefly backpacks and Hello Kitty toys
- Calico critters and Sylvanian family

COLLECTIBLES FOR EVERY FAN
- Pokémon and Magic the Gathering trading card games
- Topps and Upper Deck sports cards
- BTS and ATEEZ photo cards
- DC, Marvel, Dragon Ball Z and Star Wars action figures
- Collectible pins and coins

USED ELECTRONICS FOR LOW PRICES
- Find vintage gaming consoles and used games
- Shop computers, laptops, tablets and accessories
- Buy used and vintage cameras, camera lenses, and camera bags
- Browse guitars, keyboards, electric drums, amps, and other instruments

KIDS TOYS & CLOTHES
- Little Sleepies, Posh Peanut and Kate Quinn
- Lovevery, Melissa & Doug and  KiwiCo
- Monster High, American Girl, JellyCat

AUTHENTICATED LUXURY SHOPPING
- Shopping for authenticated luxury goods? Buy designer handbags, shoes and jewelry from brands like Coach, Marc Jacobs and Dior
- Shop the real deal. Items with a diamond badge are authenticated by independent experts, and every purchase is protected

ONLINE SHOPPING TOOLS THAT WORK FOR YOU
- Pay your way with Venmo, PayPal, credit card, split your payments or use your Mercari balance
- Shop confidently  with trusted transactions, seller communication via DM,ratings and reviews, and  Buyer Protection
- Get your item as described or your money back with free return shipping.

NATIONWIDE SHIPPING & DELIVERY
- Use Mercari Prepaid Labels to easily price and print either seller or buyer-paid shipping labels, track your shipments and get up to $200 Shipping Protection
- Get standard and economy prepaid labels with UPS, FedEx and USPS including Media Mail and first class envelopes, or ship on your own
- Sellers are asked to ship sold items within 3 business days

DIRECT SHOPPING FROM JAPAN’S #1 MARKETPLACE
- Easily shop millions of items direct from Mercari Japan
- Find top Japanese brands including Evisu, Vizvim, Comme des Garçons, BAPE, and Beams and more
- Save big on brands you know and love like Stüssy, Nintendo, Coach, Ascis,

DOWNLOAD TODAY AND FIND OUT WHAT MAKES MERCARI THE EASY WAY TO THRIFT!

Available in the US for anyone 18+

apps.title: Hot Topic: Pop Culture Fashion
apps.description:
Shop your favorite Hot Topic merch wherever you are with the revamped Hot Topic app! It's now easier than ever to browse our huge selection of officially licensed music and pop culture merch for all fandoms. Whether you want new tees or fresh hoodies, the latest fashion trends for guys, girls and plus sizes, band merch to turn up your look, anime styles you can wear head to toe, the coolest Funko drops and collectibles, home décor items, or mini backpacks and jewelry for your 'fit — we've got it. You can even round up your purchases to the nearest dollar to benefit the Hot Topic Foundation, which increases access to mental health programs and music education.
 
Download our NEW app to enjoy these improved and exclusive features:
o Smoother navigation and enhanced search capabilities to easily browse Hot Topic apparel, accessories, collectibles and home décor.
o Improved stability for seamless app experience. 
o Easily add must-have merch to your Wishlist.
o Quickly find your nearest Hot Topic store for in-store shopping.
o Use HT Reservations to book an in-store shopping reservation and skip the line.
o Score the latest promotions, deals and discounts.
o Keep track of your HT Guest List points and rewards.
o Easily manage your account activity and info, and track your order status.
o Quick access to customer service FAQs.
 
We'd love to hear from you! Email your feedback about our app or any questions to appsupport@hottopic.com.

apps.title: Ralph Lauren: Luxury Shopping
apps.description:
THE RALPH LAUREN APP 
Bringing the World of Ralph Lauren to life right at your fingertips. Personalized to your unique preferences and rich with content, the Ralph Lauren App is an elevated shopping experience that allows you to seamlessly shop your online wishlist and your favorite store.  
 
SEAMLESS SHOPPING  
•	Shop all Ralph Lauren brands: Collection, Purple Label, Polo, Lauren, Home, and Double RL 
•	Early access to products with app-exclusive shopping windows  
•	Sign up for first-to-know new arrivals and back in stock notifications  
•	Order status alerts to easily track your purchase 
•	Same Day Delivery before 4pm for select items and locations  
•	Checkout with just a few clicks 
•	Create an account with Apple social logins
•	Seamless payments with Apple Pay and Paypal
•	Buy now and pay later by using Klarna

PERSONALIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE 
•	Take the My Style quiz to curate your shopping preferences  
•	Product and content recommendations powered by AI and based on your unique taste 
•	“Shop My Style” filters for your favorite product grids  
 
CONNECT TO STORES 
•	Save and shop your preferred store  
•	Sign up for notifications on local happenings, store openings, and Ralph’s Coffee events 
•	Pick up your online purchases in-store the same day  
•	Live chat with a stylist and seamlessly schedule in-store appointments 
•	Once in-store, shop using in-store mode  
•	Your personal QR code allows for easy check-in  
•	Scan barcodes to see color and size availability, product reviews, and product recommendations. 
 
SHOP EDITORIAL STORIES 
•	Explore and shop content-rich stories for seasonal style inspiration 
 

VIRTUAL TRY-ON 
•	Virtually try-on select styles with Snap AR Technology 
 
RL WARDROBE 
•	A virtual wardrobe experience offering personalized recommendations  
•	View all recent purchases in your wardrobe  
•	Advice on how to style recent purchases  
•	Discover what’s new and recommendations on products you may like

raw_data.releaseNotes:
In this release, we’ve:
- Enhanced the Search experience to make it more intuitive and help you find products faster
- Fixed several bugs to improve overall app performance and stability

apps.title: FARFETCH - Shop Luxury Fashion
apps.description:
Global luxury. One destination. Farfetch it.

Explore and shop the world's most iconic designer brands on FARFETCH.
The FARFETCH app makes it even easier to shop for designer styles from clothing to footwear, accessories, homeware and more. All from the world's leading luxury brands and boutiques.

EXPERIENCE VIRTUAL TRY-ON
Try on designer bags, rare watches, luxury sneakers and more with our Virtual Try-On experience, only available on the FARFETCH iOS app.

EXPLORE OUR GLOBAL NETWORK
• Find thousands of trending designer pieces, handpicked daily from your favorite brands and our network of global boutiques.
• Explore luxury clothing from an evolving edit of emerging designers and heritage brands.
• Shop the latest in designer sneakers, from boxfresh releases to rare drops, including sneakers authenticated by Stadium Goods.

FARFETCHED FOR YOU
• Shop a weekly curation of designer styles, shaped by the brands and pieces you love. 
• Enable tailored notifications and recommendations for a personalized shopping experience. 
• Be the first to know about new brands, the latest fashion launches, back-in-stock pieces, new-season styles and exclusive designer promotions.

NEW: 3D BAG VIEWER 
• You can now enjoy a 360° view of luxury bags on FARFETCH. Explore the size, dimensions and texture of the most iconic designer pieces in even finer detail, to shop your perfect style.

DESIGNER SHOPPING
• Discover luxury clothing, new fashion launches, coveted bags, new shoes, sneakers and fine jewelry, plus designer kidswear. 
• Get paperless returns across all designer brands, for a more seamless designer shopping experience.
• Shop pre-owned designer pieces, from Hermès Birkin bags to vintage Chanel and Louis Vuitton, and explore one-of-a-kind watches from heritage brands including Rolex, Cartier and Patek Philippe.

BECOME A FARFETCH MEMBER
• Elevate your designer shopping experience further when you become a FARFETCH member. 
• Shopping equals exclusive rewards and benefits when you shop through our FARFETCH membership program. 
• Every designer piece you shop takes you one step closer to unlocking more, from early sale access to priority customer care and your own personal stylist.

Any questions? Get in contact with us below. 

Seen it? Love it? Want it? Need it? Farfetch it.

apps.title: CIDER - Clothing & Fashion
apps.description:
Welcome to Cider: the fashion brand of the new generation. 

We curate an inspired closet for the global trendsetter in all of us, bringing you affordable, everyday statement pieces that make you feel like the main character every single day.

We're a social-first, globally-minded brand that always keeps YOU at the forefront of our minds. Through the universal language of social media, we host an online party where fashion inspiration and influence permeates physical borders. With the support of our amazing #cidergang community, we're able to take quality and affordability to the next level, all while shipping to 100+ countries across the globe!

Go ahead and join the party on our app! Here you'll get:
 - Early access to everything - turn on push notifications for new drops, flash sales, and exclusive deals
 - Effortless shopping experience - shop by mood, trend, edit and save your faves to your wishlist
 - Safe and easy purchase - enjoy secure checkout, multiple payment methods, and instant order tracking right to your door
 
Download the Cider app now! Cute outfits are waiting... 

Also find us on:
URL: www.shopcider.com
Customer Support: hi@shopcider.com
Social (Instagram/TikTok/YouTube/Snapchat/Facebook/Pinterest): @shopcider

apps.title: Gymshark: Shop Gym Clothes
apps.description:
Gymshark App – Your Ultimate Activewear Shopping Experience

Upgrade your fitness wardrobe with the Gymshark App, your go-to destination for gym clothes, sporting goods & workout apparel. Whether you're training in the gym, running outdoors or embracing an active lifestyle, our app provides exclusive access to the latest gym clothing collections, fitness apparel & workout clothes with seamless shopping & personalized recommendations—all in one place.

WHY DOWNLOAD THE GYMSHARK APP?

▶ EARLY ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE GYM CLOTHES
Stay ahead of the game & shop the newest Gymshark gym clothes & sporting goods before anyone else. With early access to fresh drops, restocks, & limited-edition releases, you'll never miss out on must-have workout gear & fitness apparel. With app-only collections, access exclusive workout clothes & high performance designs that won't be found anywhere else. 

▶ PERSONALIZED SHOPPING EXPERIENCE
Find your perfect fit with Your Edit, a customized selection of gym clothes & sporting goods tailored to your style & preferences. Whether you're searching for leggings, sports bras, workout shorts, gym hoodies, or compression wear, the app curates recommendations based on your browsing history. Shop smarter, not harder.

▶ SEAMLESS & SECURE CHECKOUT
Fast, easy, & hassle-free. With the Gymshark App, shopping for your favorite gym clothes & fitness apparel has never been simpler. Choose from multiple secure payment options, including Apple Pay, & enjoy a fast, smooth checkout experience. 

▶ INSTANT UPDATES & NOTIFICATIONS
Turn on push notifications to be the first to know about new product launches, exclusive sporting goods, workout clothes, & fitness apparel drops, flash sales, & early-access promotions. Get notified the moment your favorite gym outfits & training gear restock, so you never miss out.

▶ ORDER TRACKING & MANAGEMENT
Track your orders & stay updated on your shipment status. Whether you're waiting on a fresh pair of squat-proof leggings, high-performance gym shorts, or seamless workout tops, you’ll always know exactly when your new gym clothes will arrive.

▶ BUILD & MANAGE YOUR WISHLIST
Save your must-have gym clothes, workout gear, & sporting goods in one convenient place. Build your ideal workout wardrobe by adding sportswear essentials to your wishlist, so you can easily shop later.

▶ EXCLUSIVE CONTENT & VIP OFFERS
Unlock Gymshark-exclusive content, fitness tips, & special discounts through the app. You'll always have access to the latest workout clothes, sporting goods, & fitness fashion and trends.

▶ JOIN THE GYMSHARK COMMUNITY
More than just a clothing store, Gymshark is a movement. Be part of a global workout & fitness community that inspires, motivates, & supports your active lifestyle. Connect with fellow athletes, fitness enthusiasts, & professionals who share your passion for training, strength, & performance.

WHY SHOP WITH GYMSHARK?

We’re here to redefine gym clothes & workout apparel with high-performance designs that blend style, comfort, & function. Designed for every athlete, every workout, & every movement, our collections include:

Gym leggings & seamless leggings – Squat-proof, supportive, & ultra-flattering.
Sports bras & tops – Designed for support & breathable comfort.
Gym shorts & joggers – Flexibility, mobility, & comfort in every movement.
Hoodies & jackets – Stay warm, stay stylish, stay ready.
Compression wear & performance gear – Next-level endurance & support.
From HIIT workouts to strength training, running, yoga, & recovery days, we have the gym clothes you need to perform at your best.

DOWNLOAD THE GYMSHARK APP TODAY

Shop the best in gym clothes, fitness fashion, sporting goods, & workout gear at your fingertips. Download now & experience the ultimate Gymshark clothing store shopping experience—anytime, anywhere.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’ve taken on your feedback and made some changes to this version, fixing some minor but very important bugs. Keep your feedback coming and we’ll continue to build the best shopping experience yet.

More than just a clothing store, Gymshark is a movement. Be part of a global workout & fitness community that inspires, motivates, & supports your active lifestyle. Connect with fellow athletes, fitness enthusiasts, & professionals who share your passion for training, strength, & performance.

WHY SHOP WITH GYMSHARK?

We’re here to redefine gym clothes & workout apparel with high-performance designs that blend style, comfort, & function. Designed for every athlete, every workout, & every movement, our collections include:

Gym leggings & seamless leggings – Squat-proof, supportive, & ultra-flattering.
Sports bras & tops – Designed for support & breathable comfort.
Gym shorts & joggers – Flexibility, mobility, & comfort in every movement.
Hoodies & jackets – Stay warm, stay stylish, stay ready.
Compression wear & performance gear – Next-level endurance & support.
From HIIT workouts to strength training, running, yoga, & recovery days, we have the gym clothes you need to perform at your best.

DOWNLOAD THE GYMSHARK APP TODAY

Shop the best in gym clothes, fitness fashion, sporting goods, & workout gear at your fingertips. Download now & experience the ultimate Gymshark clothing store shopping experience—anytime, anywhere.

The Wayfair app is the easiest way to go after your home goals. Discover app-only deals and early access to sales so you’ll always get our best prices. Plus, be the first to know about price drops on your favorite furniture, decor, and more.

Once you score something you love, get order updates and real-time delivery tracking in the palm of your hand.

Just exploring? Use Lists to save, organize, and even share your favorite finds with friends and family when you need a second opinion.

All the things you love about Wayfair’s website are in the app, too! Scroll through tons of home picks for every style, space, and budget – so you can find the ones that are just right for you. And discover items you never knew you needed with seasonal decor hubs, trend spotlights, and more.

With the Wayfair app and your design ideas, that dream space is totally doable. Download now to get started today.

apps.title: Joom. Shopping for every day.
apps.description:
Thousands of things to choose from, to suit any taste — all this, plus free shipping, available now on Joom!

Joom is an app for online shopping, used by over 250 million customers from across the world. Our web stores have all sorts of products from the United States, China, South Korea, Japan and other countries, all at the best possible prices.

Joom’s worldwide delivery is always free! 

We know how important it is to get your orders on time, and we’re constantly working on the reliability and speed of our delivery service. You can easily and conveniently track your shipment’s progress, without leaving the app!

On Joom, you can buy just about anything - clothes, shoes, cosmetics, health products, household goods, games and hobbies.

As well as gadgets, appliances  and even tools and spare parts.

And that’s not all! Our online marketplace has such a wide assortment of goods, you’ll always be able to find what you’re looking for!

Order products from known and trusted brands - online.
Check Joom every day for new sales, product lineups, and promos!
Buy items with unbelievable discounts.
Play games and get coupons! 
Check out reviews by bloggers, and read honest feedback from real buyers.
Pay with your bank card, or whatever payment system is convenient for you. 
Contact our customer support any time! We speak your language! 
Money back guaranteed if your parcel doesn’t arrive on time or is damaged in shipping.
If you move to a different city, or even halfway across the planet – we’ll be right there with you!

Give us a try today! 

If you’d like to share something with us, you can reach us at — support@joom.com 

Joom is an international online marketplace, registered in Latvia as SIA JOOM — our site’s web version is available at www.joom.com.

Paldies— that’s how they say «thank you» in Latvia.

raw_data.releaseNotes: The things we do for our beloved users: we work day and night to improve our app. And now - we've made the app smoother, got rid of several bugs and added a bit of praise for ourselves in the release. That's how awesome we are!

apps.title: Taobao - Online Shopping App
apps.developer: 浙江淘宝网络有限公司
apps.description:
New upgrade: Taobao English is now available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Canada, Cambodia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Georgia and Mongolia!For other regions, stay tuned! We're working hard to upgrade for you, in the meantime, you can still shop in our Chinese interface!

Taobao (iPhone version) offers a convenient and engaging shopping experience, specifically designed for iPhone users.

As a leading e-commerce platform in China, Taobao provides an extensive selection of products, catering to the diverse and personalized needs of over 1 billion users. Known as the "Omnipotent Taobao", it stands as a trusted destination for quality and variety for its users. 

Every day, consumers from around the globe visit Taobao, eager to explore more products for their daily needs and keep up with the latest trends!Product Features:

1. Extensive Range of Global Brands
Discover thousands of brands and retailers, offering both Chinese and international products to consumers worldwide.

2. Diverse Offerings from Small and Medium-sized Vendors
Access tens of millions of unique products from small and medium-sized businesses, as well as innovative entrepreneurs, showcasing creative and thoughtfully designed items.

3. Safe and Seamless Shopping Experience
We've integrated local e-wallets and credit card payments in selected regions, along with cross-border direct shipping options. Some products also feature free shipping and/or local return services, ensuring a secure, joyful, and effortless shopping journey.

4. NEW English Interface Now Available!
The English interface is available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, and Cambodia. Simply update your language settings. We're working hard to expand this feature to more regions soon!

5. Year-Round Promotional Activities
Take advantage of our numerous promotional events throughout the year. Enjoy discounted prices and exclusive platform benefits, making it easy to find high-quality products at even better prices.

apps.title: OfferUp - Buy. Sell. Simple.
apps.description:
Buy. Sell. Letgo. - OfferUp and Letgo are now one big marketplace.

Why you’ll love using OfferUp:

• The biggest mobile marketplace for local buyers and sellers.
• List an item using your phone or tablet in as little as 30 seconds.
• Know who you’re dealing with through reputation and safety features.
• Browse local items with thousands of new postings daily.
• Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app.
• Build a reputation with your unique seller profile page.
• Browse items by image and sort by category or location.
• Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country.

OfferUp is the easiest way to buy and sell locally.

"I have found several items at a great price on OfferUp, saving me tons of money" - Elaine
"We offered up 3 items in minutes and sold them within 48 hours. Doesn't get much easier than that!” - Summer

"I made $1,000 by offering up my daughter's unused items on OfferUp" - Claudia

Download OfferUp today to sell your used items and discover heaps of hidden treasures. 
If you subscribe to Promote Plus (1 month) via iTunes:

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews for $19.99 unless auto-renew is turned off 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of Promote Plus. Subscription and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription, where applicable.

Terms: https://offerup.com/terms/

Privacy Policy: https://offerup.com/privacy/

We've also streamlined the design of item cards. With additional under-the-hood upgrades, the app is now more secure and reliable than ever.
Thanks for using OfferUp!

apps.title: Sam's Club: Pickup & Delivery
apps.description:
Sam’s Club. Discover all the perks of being a member with the app. Download today!

Save time and shop easier every day with the Sam’s Club app. Make the most of your membership with easy online shopping for everything from everyday essentials to premium products. With a Sam’s Club Membership you can conveniently shop for fresh groceries, savory snacks, pharmacy prescriptions and more.

Hate waiting in line? Thanks to Sam’s Club you can skip the checkout line in the club with convenient Scan & Go™ shopping. Simply shop, scan and pay all in the app. Or schedule your order for Free Curbside Pickup at a time that works for you. Just drive up and get on with your day! While you’re there, save time at the pump. Pay directly in the app for your fuel, at member’s-only prices. Join and see how Sam’s Club makes it easy for you to do more with your day.

Sam’s Club also has you covered with prescription management, transfers and refill requests all available in the app. Plus, schedule immunization appointments and more health services. Conveniently get what you need most without having to leave the app.

Your Sam’s Club membership is filled with perks that help you spend less time shopping and more time doing the things you love.

Download today and get started!


So many benefits!

Premium quality at members-only prices.

· Exclusive Member’s Mark™ brand brings amazing value to help you live your best life.

· Everything you need from home essentials and groceries to snacks and medications.

· Party prep? Cookout celebration? Sam’s Club has you covered.


Fast & easy ways to shop.

· Skip the checkout line when you shop the club with the Scan & Go™ app feature.

· Get fresh grocery Delivery from Club right to your doorstep. Choose same-day, next-day or fastest Express service to get your order in 3 hours or less. Plus members get free  delivery on eligible $50 orders and have no minimum for $8 for Express*. 

· Drive up and let us load your order with Curbside Pickup. Free for all members with no minimum or fees.

· Shop in the app 24/7 and ship products directly to your home.*


In-app Pharmacy.

· Easily transfer prescriptions directly in the app.

· Purchase and refill prescriptions.

· Track prescriptions for the whole family, including your pets.

· Schedule immunizations at your club Pharmacy. Walk-ins also welcome!


Download the app and get the most from your membership today.

*Terms and fees may apply. See SamsClub.com/TermsAndConditions for details.

apps.title: UNIQLO: Clothes Shopping
apps.description:
Discover effortless shopping and effortless style — all with the UNIQLO app. Explore the latest men’s, women’s and kids’ clothing collaborations, inspire your style with fresh fashion ideas, and claim exclusive app-only deals. From timeless LifeWear and streetwear favorites to winter HEATTECH thermal layers and breathable AIRism lines for warmer days, be the first to know when the clothing you love most is back in stock. 

Complete your wardrobe with everyday denim jeans and essential accessories for your home and redefine your fashion shopping experience with the app that brings you the best of UNIQLO. Discover a clothing app for men, women and kids.

Inspire your clothes shopping
Browse styles shared by customers, influencers, and UNIQLO staff members from all over the world and get inspiration for your next outfit. 
Find ideas for women’s, men’s and kids’ clothing and shop practical, stylish collections for all ages and seasons. 
Discover online-exclusive sizes and clothing styles you won’t find anywhere else.

Kids’ and baby clothes shopping
Discover stylish and comfortable clothing for the little ones. 
From playful and durable everyday kids’ clothing like jeans, t-shirts, and shorts, to soft and gentle fabrics perfect for newborns, UNIQLO has just what you need for your kids’ wardrobes. 
Shop seasonal kids’ clothing collections, featuring streetwear-inspired designs and limited-edition collaborations, all exclusive to UNIQLO.

Save your favorite clothing styles 
Tag clothes you like as “Favorites” and keep a collection of looks you love.
Get notified when items you’ve tagged as favorites are available for pickup, back in stock, or on sale.
Keep adding your favorite clothes to your collection for more personalized style and shopping recommendations.

Clothes-sizing videos 
See styles up close with product videos that give you a detailed look at the cut and fabric, giving you a more realistic idea of how clothing fits.

MySize ASSIST
Take the guesswork out of fashion shopping with MySize Assistant.
Simply enter your body measurements and preferred fit, and we’ll recommend a clothing size that’s perfect for you.

Easy in-store pickups
Save on shipping costs and skip store queues when you’re clothes shopping and buying other products using the app. 
Choose "Ship to Store" on your checkout screen and collect from any UNIQLO store that suits you within 1 hour, completely free of charge. 
See when products are out of stock online but available in-store and swing by for a swift, same-day pick-up. 
Avoid the disappointment of a wasted trip by checking whether a new product or special offer item is in stock before you visit your favorite store.

Back-in-stock notifications
Get alerts sent straight to your phone and be the first to know when the clothing style you’ve been eyeing is back in stock.

UNIQLO product scanner
Use the app to scan product barcodes at home or in store and easily check if nearby stores have your perfect clothing size and fit. 

App-exclusive offers  
Download UNIQLO and unlock $10 off your first purchase of $75 or more—new customers only.
Scan your app member ID at checkout to unlock exclusive, member-only discounts. 

Save time—and the planet—with e-receipts
Opt for e-receipts at checkout to easily track your clothes shopping history right from the app.
Return or exchange clothing and other items using electronic receipts, saving you the hassle of keeping track of paper receipts.

Have your say
Share feedback on items you’ve bought with the UNIQLO team and keep a lookout for product improvements. 
Read reviews from customers who have bought the same products as you. See the star rating, gender, height, weight and age of the customer who posted the review to help you choose the perfect product.

UNIQLO customer care
Chat with a UNIQLO representative for assistance with all your clothes and shopping needs.

See styles up close with product videos that give you a detailed look at the cut and fabric, giving you a more realistic idea of how clothing fits.

MySize ASSIST
Take the guesswork out of fashion shopping with MySize Assistant.
Simply enter your body measurements and preferred fit, and we’ll recommend a clothing size that’s perfect for you.

Easy in-store pickups
Save on shipping costs and skip store queues when you’re clothes shopping and buying other products using the app. 
Choose "Ship to Store" on your checkout screen and collect from any UNIQLO store that suits you within 1 hour, completely free of charge. 
See when products are out of stock online but available in-store and swing by for a swift, same-day pick-up. 
Avoid the disappointment of a wasted trip by checking whether a new product or special offer item is in stock before you visit your favorite store.

Back-in-stock notifications
Get alerts sent straight to your phone and be the first to know when the clothing style you’ve been eyeing is back in stock.

UNIQLO product scanner
Use the app to scan product barcodes at home or in store and easily check if nearby stores have your perfect clothing size and fit. 

App-exclusive offers  
Download UNIQLO and unlock $10 off your first purchase of $75 or more—new customers only.
Scan your app member ID at checkout to unlock exclusive, member-only discounts. 

Save time—and the planet—with e-receipts
Opt for e-receipts at checkout to easily track your clothes shopping history right from the app.
Return or exchange clothing and other items using electronic receipts, saving you the hassle of keeping track of paper receipts.

Have your say
Share feedback on items you’ve bought with the UNIQLO team and keep a lookout for product improvements. 
Read reviews from customers who have bought the same products as you. See the star rating, gender, height, weight and age of the customer who posted the review to help you choose the perfect product.

UNIQLO customer care
Chat with a UNIQLO representative for assistance with all your clothes and shopping needs.

apps.title: MANGO - Online fashion
apps.description:
Description. 

Get the latest trends and discover them from any location. If you love wearing fashion and using any occasion to buy clothes via the internet, download our MANGO app. Simple, easy and intuitive! 

Our most digital version features all the garments in the collection: women’s, men’s and children’s clothing. What’s more, through notifications you can discover the latest products, enjoy exclusive offers and stay up to date with the latest trends in online fashion. 

Choose your favourites with the app! Download it free and enjoy a unique experience in mobile format. 

Fashion on your mobile. 

Wherever you are, log on quickly to get your must-haves. Browse through the different collections featured, be inspired by the proposed outfits in each editorial and find what you are looking for by using the size, colour and price filters. Be inspired by all the proposals for the perfect shopping experience.  

Your online shopping bag can be accessed from any device. 

Whenever you log on to our online clothing app with your user ID and password, your items will be saved so that you can access them from any device. So, if you start filling your shopping bag from your Smartphone and later decide to continue shopping via your Tablet, the items will be synchronised, allowing you to finalise your order whenever and however you want. Enjoy your online fashion app whenever you want! 

Barcode scanner. 

You can also use the app when you are shopping in our physical stores. If you see an item you want to buy but there are none left in your size or preferred colour, you can get it via our app. Scan the barcode of the item, or enter it manually, to see where you can find one or to buy it online. Once you have placed the order, you can receive it at home or at your preferred location. 

Exclusive information

You can also use our app to stay up to date with our promotions and exclusive offers in online fashion. Enable the instant notifications feature and you’ll be among the first to discover the new collection garments arriving each week, the lookbooks to inspire your stylings of the season and the discounts and promotions you can enjoy. 

Find your nearest store. 

If you need to have the garment you want right now, use the geolocation feature of our app and find your nearest store and the quickest way to get there. 

Create your Wishlist. 

Now, your Wishlist, in a single click: include all the garments you like most in your Wishlist. Also, if you didn't manage to buy a garment in time, you can enable an availability notification. Simply enter your e-mail and you’ll receive a message as soon as it’s back in stock. 

Manage your account. 

Log on to your profile and edit your personal data whenever you like, for example the delivery address. You can also log on to the My orders section to keep all your till receipts, for both online orders and your purchases in physical stores.  You can also track all your orders and manage any returns. 

The MANGO app is much more than an online store. Shop in a simple and secure way. 

We invite you to send us your comments and suggestions on this update at the following e-mail address: online@mango.com

raw_data.releaseNotes:
The new version is here!  

We’ve added some performance improvements, and we’ve also fixed some bugs.

Enjoy the MANGO app experience!

apps.title: ThredUp: Online Thrift Store
apps.description:
ThredUp - Fashion that looks good, feels good, does good—for your wallet, wardrobe, and the world.

Thrift & sell women's and kids' clothes online. Get 50% off + free shipping on your first ThredUp order today & enjoy:
*Over 55,000 brands, from Gap to Gucci.
*Up to 90% off est. retail for brands like Lululemon, Zara, J. Crew, Ann Taylor LOFT & more.
*60K new arrivals every day.
*Get a free bag & $10 shopping credit when you sell with us for the first time.
*Easy returns & free shipping with orders over $89.
*Payment via Paypal, Apple Pay, Affirm, and credit card.

SHOP
Up to 90% off est. retail on womenswear, accessories, maternity & kids' clothes. ThredUp offers high-quality secondhand clothes from Lululemon, Zara, J. Crew & Ann Taylor LOFT and more. Plus, shop designer brands secondhand like The Real Real, discover Gucci, Louis Vuitton, Kate Spade & more wishlist finds, including Rent the Runway REVIVE.

SELL 
Like Poshmark but without the work, our Clean Out service is hands down the easiest way to sell or donate your secondhand clothes. We do the work, you get cash or credit. Here's how it works:
1. Order a Clean Out Bag or free shipping label on ThredUp's selling app.
2. Fill a bag with gently-used women’s or kids’ clothes from brands like Lululemon, Zara, J. Crew & Ann Taylor LOFT, and send it back.
3. Keep your feet up. We inspect, photograph, list, and ship items for you.

FASHION, MEET FOREVER 
There are enough amazing clothes on the planet, let's wear them. We’ve upcycled 200M+ items so far and we’re just getting started. Join our community of fashion lovers who are committed to a more sustainable future by giving clothes a second life.

PRESS
One of TIME's Best Inventions of 2024: ThredUp AI Search
"The App for the Responsible Shopper" - Elle
"The Easiest Way To Practice Sustainable Fashion" - Forbes
"Your favorite brands at a crazy reduced price." - Seventeen

FROM SHOPPERS LIKE YOU
"I just started using ThredUp, and I'm absolutely addicted. The selection is HUUUGE, the prices are SUPER reasonable, as are the shipping rates (I'm looking at you, Poshmark)." - Jenna G.

"This is where I get 95% of my clothes from. Not Your Daughter Jean's, Splendid, Lululemon Athletica, they have a great selection of high end brands for such a great deal." - Alexandra S.

"I’ve been buying and selling with ThredUp for over two years. As an eco-conscious, budget-friendly, fashion enthusiast this is the best digital option for buying ‘used’ clothes from a company. Compared to PoshMark or eBay, I have much more confidence in the quality of clothes I buy with ThredUp since they go through inspections AND they have a great return policy! Win-win." - K.M.A

"The ease of using this app was mindblowing! I set the filters to the category, sizes, styles, and even sale percentages! And up pops whatever matches what I chose!" - Adell H.

"love love love this app. it always works and I love sending my clothes here to sell. it's such an easy process. and you can use your credit to buy more clothes. perfect!" - Melissa Z.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Nothing big to report, just a fixing a couple of bugs. Happy thrifting!

apps.title: LTK: Shop People You Trust
apps.description:
LTK is the only place to follow and shop from real Creators. Join millions of shoppers in the world’s most-loved shopping community—where inspiration meets connection, and shopping becomes smarter, easier, and more fun. Discover trends, shop your favorite looks, and connect with people who share your style.

Follow top Creators near you and around the world for fashion, beauty, fitness, home, family, and more. Shop directly from their posts and videos—no guesswork, just results. From your personalized profile to group chats, LTK is where shopping becomes social.

Why Shoppers Love LTK
• Discover Together – Follow Creators, brands, and friends who inspire your everyday style.
• Shop Smarter – Get direct links to Creator-tested finds, from wardrobe refreshes to trending must-haves.
• Stay Connected – Share, shop, and chat in real time with your community.
• Create Your Profile – Build your public style space to showcase favorites and connect with others.
• Never Miss Out – Unlock exclusive sales, deals, and real-time price drop alerts.
• Curated For You – Personalized feeds make shopping faster, easier, and more fun.

With LTK, you get more than inspiration—you get connection. Connection to Creators you trust. Connection to styles that fit your life. Connection to a community that shops, shares, and inspires— because LTK is better together.

Terms of Service: https://company.shopltk.com/ltk-terms-of-service.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
We've updated the app to provide the most seamless and connected experience yet.

- Fresh Look & Feel: A stunning Liquid Glass design makes Creator posts shine and adapts as you scroll, giving you a more immersive content experience in the Watch Tab.
- Smarter Shopping: Search is now easier to find in its own dedicated spot on the bottom right corner, and Discover is simpler to browse—helping you get to the inspiration you want, faster.
- Your Profile, Your Style: Your LTK Profile is now front and center, making it easier to showcase your style, shop your saves, and connect with creators.
- Stay Connected: Your Activity feed, including notifications, updates, and Group Chat messages, is now in the top-right corner of the following feed for quick access.
- Homepage Widget: Add an LTK widget to stay up to date with your favorite Creators’ daily drops, right from your home screen.
- Shop What You See: Snap or upload a pic in the search bar to instantly shop similar styles on LTK. Plus, with iOS 26’s new visual intelligence, you can now search directly from what’s on your screen—instantly connecting what you see to products and  Creator content you love.

Not on iOS 26 yet? You’ll still enjoy the bug fixes, easier navigation, and new ways to connect with Creators.

apps.title: The RealReal - Buy+Sell Luxury
apps.description:
The RealReal is the world’s largest marketplace for authenticated luxury resale where you can buy and sell items from top designers across women’s, men’s and kid’s fashion, fine jewelry and watches, collectibles and home.
Shoppers enjoy up to 90% off retail prices and sellers earn up to 70% of commission when they sell. The RealReal offers international shipping to 61 countries
 SHOPPING ON THE REALREAL
All items for sale on The RealReal are authenticated by an in-house team of luxury experts including certified gemologists, horologists, apparel specialists, and handbag experts. Each item is 100% guaranteed for authenticity. Returns are accepted for apparel, footwear, jewelry, and watches. Over 10,000 items hit the app each day, from Louis Vuitton handbags to Gucci clutches and Rolex watches. The RealReal is an industry leader in sustainability as well, firmly believing in shopping responsibly and the positive impact of recirculating luxury items.
 SELLING YOUR LUXURY ITEMS ON THE REALREAL
Selling your designer clothing and accessories on The RealReal is effortless. Luxury Managers in 20 U.S. markets consult with consignors virtually or in person and review the items they wish to sell. Alternatively, consignors may choose to send their items to us for free. Most items sell within thirty days, and consignors receive payments once a month. 
 
Download The RealReal app today to get started buying or selling authenticated luxury items within minutes.

- We've squashed some bugs and updated the app to make your experience more enjoyable

Feedback? Let's chat. Send us an email at feedback@therealreal.com and tell us what you think.

apps.description:
The best of Levi’s®, tailored just for you. From exclusive product launches to personalized recommendations, we’re making it easier than ever to be part of our world. Download it today and access:

QUICK & SIMPLE SHOPPING

The easiest way to find your favorite jeans, shirts, Trucker Jackets and essential clothes. Browse your favorites from anywhere at any time.

EXCLUSIVE PRODUCT DROPS

Download the app and you’ll be first in line for exclusive styles and special collections you can’t find anywhere else. One-of-a-kind pieces and fresh collaborations are all at your fingertips.

A CUSTOM EXPERIENCE

apps.title: DSW Designer Shoe Warehouse
apps.description:
The DSW Designer Shoe Warehouse app delivers a full shopping experience with fast, easy checkout. DSW VIP members can easily access account information, including available Rewards.
 
DSW has thousands of shoes, handbags and accessories for women, men and kids - all at your fingertips! Download the free DSW Designer Shoe Warehouse app for:
 
• Easy shopping: Find the latest shoes for women, men and kids from all your favorite brands. Shop and purchase your new favorite shoes with our easy, streamlined checkout process.
• VIP access: Track your Rewards and points all in one place. Scan your VIP member card and other offers right from the app when in store (or use them directly in the app or online)
• In-store pick-up: See if the shoes you want are available before visiting your DSW store. Buy on the app and pick up in store!
• Store locations: Check out the DSW store locator for instant directions and store hours.
• Clearance Calculator: Use the Clearance Calculator in store to see the exact price you'll pay (and how much you'll save!)
• Product scanning: Can't find your size or color in a DSW store? Scan the barcode to find it on dsw.com, read reviews and see product information.

California Privacy: California residents can find DSW’s California Privacy Notice here: https://www.dsw.com/en/us/legal/california-privacy-notice

apps.title: Famous Footwear - Shop Shoes
apps.description:
The Famous Footwear® App is the only place to get exclusive deals on all your favorite brand-name shoes! Shop the latest shoes from brands like Nike, adidas, Birkenstock, Vans, Sperry, Converse and Skechers. 

EARN REWARDS WITH FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS 

Earn $5 Reward Cash for every 100 points — up to $250 a year. Good on any pair. 1 point = $1 spent. Redeem any time on the app. 

Enjoy FREE SHIPPING, no minimum on all orders! 

Celebrate your birthday with $5 Reward Cash plus 2X points per dollar during your birthday month. 

Stack & Save Reward Cash with a coupon, a bonus point offer and sales. 

Discover member exclusive App Deals and offers. 

Get Extras When You Want: Activate your Extra BOGO 1/2 OFF or 2X Bonus Points Day in the app when you choose. 

APPLY FOR THE FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS CREDIT CARD 

Enjoy $10 OFF your first purchase with the card, at the time of account opening.*  

Double Up on Reward Cash.** Earn $5 Cardmember Reward Cash for every $100 you spend with the card. That’s in addition to your $5 Reward Cash for every 100 points you earn with FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS. For details, see Famous.com/creditcard. 

SHOP YOUR FAVORITE BRANDS 

Easily shop for shoes and enjoy Free Standard Shipping on orders of $75 or more. No minimum for FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS members. 

View current order status, past purchase history, account activity and rewards on the app.  

Check out faster with wallet integration featuring PayPal, Apple Pay and QuadPay. 

ENJOY FAMOUSLY FAST PICKUP 

Pick it up your way — in-store or at the curb. Orders typically ready in about an hour. 

Check a store near you for curbside availability and hours. All store locations offer in-store pickup and most offer curbside. 

MAXIMIZE YOUR SHOE SHOPPING EXPERIENCE 

With nearly 1,000 stores across the country, quickly locate the shoe store nearest you. 

Use the app barcode scanner on any shoe box in the store to see all available colors, read reviews, and get additional product details. 

Stay up to date on the latest footwear trends each season with Trend Shops — featuring fashionable sneakers, sandals, boots and more.  

Famous Footwear features athletic and casual shoes from hundreds of nationally recognized brands for women, men and kids! With stores nationwide and even more selection online, Famous Footwear helps you put your best foot forward every day. 

 *Application and approval must occur same day to receive the offer. Offer only available at U.S. Famous Footwear® Stores or Outlets, or at Famous.com. $10 offer can be combined with Reward Cash, one additional redeemable coupon, a bonus point offer, and promotional merchandise discounts. Valid one time only. Maximum of $10 off. Excludes purchases of Famous Footwear gift cards.  

**Offer only available at U.S. Famous Footwear® Stores or Outlets, or at Famous.com. STAR and SUPERSTAR Cardmember purchases will earn toward both $5 Cardmember Reward Cash for every $100 spent and $5 Reward Cash for every 100 points earned as a FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS® member. Excludes taxes, shipping, and purchase of Famous Footwear gift cards. FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS members must identify themselves as members at checkout in-store or log in to their FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS accounts online to earn points toward Reward Cash and spend toward Cardmember Reward Cash. Offer is exclusive to FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS Credit Cardmembers enrolled in the FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS program. This rewards program is provided by Famous Footwear and its terms may change at any time. For full FAMOUSLY YOU REWARDS Terms and Conditions, please see Famous.com/rewards/terms-and-conditions.

apps.title: Rue La La - Shop Top Fashion
apps.description:
OVERVIEW
Shopping your faves just got faster and easier. Not a Rue La La Member? No problem. It’s free and you can join quickly right from our award-winning app. With exclusive sales, delivery alerts, order tracking, and Boutique reminders, you’ll never miss a stylish beat. 

TOP FEATURES
+ Exclusive sales: Get special access to app-only sales. (Make sure you have push notifications enabled to stay up to date. For information on how to turn push on, visit https://now.ruelala.com/turn-push-notifications/.)
+ Shipping perks: Get 30 days of unlimited shipping after you make your first purchase.
+ Delivery alerts: Track all of your orders and get real-time notifications when they arrive. 
+ Easy checkout: Check out in just one tap. Also, add new credit cards with our easy-to-use credit card scanning functionality.
+ Boutique reminders: Add upcoming sales to your device calendar so you don’t miss out. (App-only feature.)
+ Shop by category: Filter sales to shop by brand, color, and size. Sort them to shop by best sellers or price.
+ Syncing across devices: Add a product to your bag on one device and your cart stays with you on all of your other devices. (Perfect for shopping in bed on your iPad or on your iPhone while on your way to a meeting.)
+ Social sharing: Show your friends those sought-after heels you just bought via Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter, email, or SMS. They’ll thank you for it.

BEST-SELLING BRANDS
PANDORA Jewelry
Louis Vuitton
Burberry
Tory Burch
Brooks Brothers
Ray-Ban
Cole Haan
Stuart Weitzman
Valentino

CATEGORIES
+ Women: Trending shoes, boots, dresses, skirts, swimwear, maternity, and more for your closet. Score beautiful colors and shop trending luxe marketplace brands like Louis Vuitton, Burberry, Tory Burch, and Valentino.
+ Men: Trending shoes, dress shirts, dress pants, sport coats, colorful swimwear, and more for your closet. Trending luxe marketplace brands include Brooks Brothers, Cole Haan, and many more. 
+ Kids: Shoes, shirts, pants, dresses, skirts, swimwear, and more for their closet. 
+ Accessories: Trending jewelry, watches, luggage, socks, gadgets, and more must-haves. Trending luxe marketplace brands include PANDORA Jewelry, Ray-Ban, and many more.
+ Home: Furniture, luxe bedding, bath musts, sheets and towels, kitchenware, cooking essentials, and more trending décor.
+ Travel: Trending, super luxe vacation destinations and packages for a steal.

HAVE QUESTIONS? 
Email mobilehelp@cs.ruelala.com or contact a Rue La La Concierge at ruelala.com/help and we’ll be happy to help make your experience better.

AWARDS
Rue La La’s iPhone app was featured by Apple as one of the Best New Apps.
The iPhone app and iPad app were selected from nearly 13,000 entries as Official Honorees in the 19th Annual Webby Awards in two categories: Most Innovative Mobile Shopping App and Most Innovative Tablet Shopping App.

apps.title: QVC Mobile Shopping (US)
apps.description:
Mobile shopping has never been more simplified and fun. Now you can watch our TV channels live by simply downloading the updated QVC app on your iPhone. Get more of what you love with the QVC for iPhone® app that can be downloaded for free. The My Account feature lets you access more order information than ever. You can track your order, edit Easy Pay® options, and manage your address book. Plus, as always, you’ll never miss our Today's Special Value®—our best find of the day, an item we believe you’ll love. That goes for our QVC2 Big Deal™ and Beauty iQ Steal™, too!


NEW FEATURES
• Now introducing PayPal as a payment method and PayPal Express to place orders quickly and easily!
• A new look and enhanced user interface across our Home screen, Product Listings, and Product Detail pages make it easier to shop your favorites, from fashion to cosmetics to electronics
• New checkout process for a seamless experience
• QVC live video displayed right from the Home tab, so you never miss a moment
• Quick links to our TSV, QVC2 Big Deal, Beauty iQ Steal, and more
• Seamlessly browse through recent on-air items, right from the Home screen
• At the end of the page? Keep scrolling to see the latest happenings, new offers, trends, and more!
• For “Do Not Sell My Personal Information” rights under California law please refer to the Right to Opt-Out of Sales section of the QVC Privacy Policy

EXISTING FEATURES
•Watch our full 16:9 HD live stream and purchase the current Item On Air
•See customer ratings & reviews on our Product Detail pages and Product Listings. Plus, view product images, information, sizing, color swatches, styles, availability, and delivery date estimates on our enhanced Product Detail pages
•Find exactly what you're looking for with our full-search capability – search over 50,000 clothing, cosmetics, electronics, home décor, and other items by category, item number, product description, brand, phrase, or word. From there, you have the ability to narrow those search results
•On our Homepage, find our Today's Special Value offer, QVC2 Big Deal, Beauty iQ Steal, and current
Item On Air, plus Items Recently On Air, and featured promotions
•Narrow the Items Recently On Air product listing by show
•Share items via Facebook or Twitter
•Speed Buy® to purchase items quickly and confidently! New customers can easily create an account—anytime, anywhere
•Check your order status, edit or cancel orders, and manage Auto-Delivery
•Update your personal information, manage your address book, and view/edit Easy Pay options
•Access and shop your Wish List

QVC wants you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not satisfied for any reason, our return policy allows you to send back the merchandise within 30 days of the date you received the package for an exchange or a refund of the purchase price, minus the full shipping & handling and Q Return Label fees. QVC will refund any paid S&H fees and Q Return Label fees if an item is defective or we were in error. Purchases from QVC and the use of QVC services are subject to our General Terms and Conditions of Use and our Privacy Policy, which can be found at the bottom of the QVC.com homepage.

Award-winning Service: We've been honored multiple times with BizRate's "Circle of Excellence" distinction.

QVC is committed to giving you quality service and treating your information responsibly. For details, please see our Privacy Statement.

QVC is Norton Secured powered by Digicert, so you can feel confident while shopping with us. We participate in the Norton Secured Seal Program with Extended Validation of our organization. All of your personal information is encrypted by Transport Layer Security (TLS) software when it's transmitted to us during the checkout process, just as it is on QVC.com.

Watching QVC's video stream may significantly increase the data usage amount of your mobile device and may incur additional fees. Contact your carrier for more information.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: ALDI USA
apps.developer: ALDI International Services GmbH & Co. oHG
apps.description:
Want a quick, easy, and affordable grocery shopping experience? Order ALDI from anywhere with the new and improved ALDI app. Find your local store, select pickup or delivery, fill your cart and just like that, groceries are just a click away. Download the app, sign in or create your account and get started today.

Features of the ALDI App:
• Store Locator – Find your local ALDI, get directions, opening hours, services, and contact information.
• Weekly Ads – Check out this week’s weekly ad, including ALDI Savers and ALDI Finds, while also previewing next week’s Weekly Ads.
• ALDI Finds – Discover limited-time only products at incredible prices.
• Shopping List Tool – If you’d like to shop in store, save products to your virtual shopping list and use it as you navigate your local ALDI.
• Always Low Prices – Shop with confidence that you’ll be buying high-quality groceries at an affordable, always low price.
• Order Grocery Pickup and Grocery Delivery – Choose how you shop with either curbside pickup at your local ALDI or delivery to your home.
• View Past Orders – Re-order a past grocery haul with a single tap or look at past orders and find the products you’ve already purchased.

Start by downloading the ALDI App and connect it with your ALDI account. You can create one in the app or online. Save money on groceries from home or on the go with the ALDI App today!

About ALDI
At ALDI, we hand-select and curate high-quality products for you and your family. We can’t promise you’ll find ten choices of the same item, but we can promise you’ll find the best ones at the best price. At our core, we’re a grocery store offering low prices on high quality food, home goods, and other household items. We’re also a fun place to discover new items and explore healthy options.

ALDI Groceries
We offer groceries to fit everyone’s specific dietary interests, needs or concerns. From organic certified gluten-free products and our meat products that contain no antibiotics, added hormones or animal byproducts, we can fit everyone’s lifestyle.

Start by downloading the ALDI App and connect it with your ALDI account. You can create one in the app or online. Save money on groceries from home or on the go with the ALDI App today!

About ALDI
At ALDI, we hand-select and curate high-quality products for you and your family. We can’t promise you’ll find ten choices of the same item, but we can promise you’ll find the best ones at the best price. At our core, we’re a grocery store offering low prices on high quality food, home goods, and other household items. We’re also a fun place to discover new items and explore healthy options.

ALDI Groceries
We offer groceries to fit everyone’s specific dietary interests, needs or concerns. From organic certified gluten-free products and our meat products that contain no antibiotics, added hormones or animal byproducts, we can fit everyone’s lifestyle.

Download the Bed Bath & Beyond app today to experience more for every room, every home, & every budget.

apps.title: SSENSE: Shop Designer Fashion
apps.description:
LUXURY FASHION AND LIFESTYLE DESTINATION

The official SSENSE app offers a seamless shopping experience geared to your needs. Discover new season arrivals, trending designers, exclusive collaborations, and limited-release collections across womenswear, menswear, kidswear, and Everything Else™. Shop a curated edit of over 500 luxury and lifestyle brands, emerging designers, and streetwear labels, including Gucci, Essentials, Aesop, Jacquemus, Moncler, Alexander McQueen, Converse, Balenciaga, Off-White, Saint Laurent, Versace, and hundreds more. Featuring easy navigation, quick searches, simple filters, sales alerts, and daily style drops. The SSENSE app is accessible in English, French, Japanese, Korean, and Simplified Chinese. Delivery to over 150 countries worldwide.


INTUITIVE SHOPPING
Use our filter options to shop by brand or category and explore over 60,000 styles from more than 500 luxury brands and independent designer labels.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
Browse personalized product selections based on your preferences and recent shopping activity.

UP-TO-DATE ALERTS
Enable push notifications and be the first to know about the latest product drops, new collections, SSENSE collaborations and partnerships, as well as sales and promotional offers.

ORDER TRACKING
Keep track of your shopping history and current orders and get the latest updates on your shipments, all in one place.

STREAMLINED CHECKOUT
Enjoy a seamless shopping experience from product discovery to hassle-free checkout, and expedited delivery.

YOUR WISHLIST
Save your favorite designer styles and lifestyle pieces in your wishlist and add them to your shopping cart when you are ready to purchase.

SOCIAL SHARING
Share your coveted designer styles, notable SSENSE collaborations, and limited-release product drops on your preferred social media network including Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, and iMessages.

SSENSE (pronounced [es-uhns]) is a global technology platform and fashion and lifestyle shopping destination blurring the lines between culture and commerce. It is renowned for its distinctive offering of established and emerging luxury brands, streetwear labels, and original editorial features and cultural content. Visit www.ssense.com and follow @ssense for new arrivals, exclusive collaborations, special offers, and much more. The customer care team is available in 5 languages, 24/7 at customercare@ssense.com.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Grailed – Buy & Sell Fashion
apps.description:
Buy, Sell, Discover. Join Grailed, a trusted platform for personal style, and connect with a global community of over 10M+ style enthusiasts. Explore curated collections featuring millions of menswear and womenswear pieces from 10K+ designers. Whether you're looking to buy coveted pieces, sell pre-loved items from your closet, or discover the latest trends, you can do it with confidence on Grailed.

BUY, SELL & ROTATE YOUR WARDROBE
Experience trusted and protected transactions on a platform designed for the style-savvy. With low seller fees and direct exposure to a hub of buyers, it's time to rotate your wardrobe and profit from your style.

SHOP THE LATEST TRENDS
Shop with confidence with Grailed’s authentication practices and purchase protection for qualified transactions. Unlock great prices and negotiate with sellers for deals. Explore menswear and womenswear styles for any aesthetic across apparel, footwear, accessories and more.
• Vintage: Designer, Denim, Band Tees, Leather Jackets, Y2K-inspired styles
• Luxury: Gucci, Dior, Prada, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Rolex
• Streetwear: Off-White, Supreme, Nike, Jordan, adidas, New Balance
• Avant-Garde: Raf Simons, Rick Owens, Maison Margiela, Comme des Garçons, Helmut Lang

READ REVIEWS FROM THE COMMUNITY
Seller Ratings, Reviews, Transaction History and Seller Badges provide transparency and added peace of mind. Grailed relies on direct feedback from community members to provide additional accountability.

ENJOY A PERSONALIZED EXPERIENCE
The Grailed feed serves personalized recommendations tailored to your style. Follow designers and sellers, receive notifications for saved searches and price drops, and filter your feed to match your preferences. Explore curated collections and dive into our 'Trending' and 'For You' selects designed with your style in mind.

DISCOVER AND GET INSPIRED
Get style inspiration through editorial content like street style and designer deep dives. Whether you're evolving your personal style, exploring new trends, or looking for the perfect piece to complete your wardrobe, Grailed is your one-stop-shop.

GRAILED IN THE NEWS
Grailed has been featured across accredited publications, including Vogue, The New York Times Style, Harper’s Bazaar, GQ, Esquire, Bloomberg, Nylon, WWD, Dazed, Elle, WhoWhatWear, Highsnobiety, Complex, Hypebeast and more.

apps.title: Nike SNKRS: Sneakers & Apparel
apps.description:
Explore, buy, and unlock the best of Nike, Jordan, and Converse. The SNKRS App provides Nike Members insider access to the latest launches, exclusive releases, and experiences that Nike has to offer.

SNKRS FEATURES

STAY A STEP AHEAD
* Shop: Buy the latest styles across footwear and apparel 
* Set Notifications: View upcoming drops and prepare for the pairs you want most
* Reserve with SNKRS Pass: secure your pair with SNKRS and pick it up at your nearest retailer for a seamless launch day experience
* Get Exclusive Access: Get rewarded with invite-only launches to some of the most coveted styles, available only for select Nike Members
* Catch Surprise Drops: Be ready for a range of unique launch scavenger hunts – access might be hidden in geo-located events, scannable augmented reality targets or scratch-able images

EXPLORE THE COMMUNITY
* View SNKRS Stories: Learn about the inspiration and heritage behind your favorite styles and the untold tales from the SNKRS community
* Vote on Polls: Have your voice heard in the sneaker community by answering questions that inform everything from future products to experiences and content
* Watch SNKRS Live: Tune in for livestreams with SNKRS and become a part of the conversation with live polling, never before heard stories, the insider scoop and more
* Discover the NBHD: Learn more about the global network of Nike partners and brands that inspire their communities, and connect with your local doors

HOW TO GET STARTED
* Sign up or log in with your Nike account
* Save your correct name, size and shipping address under your profile so you are ready for launch day

Join the SNKRS community today.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Get ready for an even smoother SNKRS experience. A brand-new navigation bar helps you find what you need faster. While our latest feature, SNKRS Maps, lets you explore partner stores and local sneaker communities near you.

apps.title: Trendyol: Online Shopping
apps.description:
Welcome to your ultimate shopping destination where everything you need, from fashion and beauty to home essentials and more, comes together in one place. Enjoy amazing deals, top brands, the latest trends, and so much more!

WELCOME DISCOUNT

First impressions matter, right? That’s why we’ve got an exclusive discount code waiting for you on your first order. Just download Trendyol and claim your welcome treat."

MORE ABOUT THE APP

Trendyol is your go-to shopping platform, making shopping easy and seamless. As you swipe through thousands of global, local and Turkish brands and millions of products, you’ll find a new trend waiting at every scroll. Planning outfits? Tracking orders? Enjoying free returns? It’s all a breeze. Here’s a tip: mark your faves and we’ll let you know when the prices drop. Download the Trendyol app today and start exploring!"

MORE ABOUT TRENDYOL

With our wide selection of clothing, footwear, accessories, home essentials, beauty must-haves, electronics, and more, Trendyol transforms shopping into an experience that’s accessible and budget-friendly. Trendyol Collection translates the latest runway trends into wearable outfits for every style, occasion and budget. Our lines range from a glamorous party selection (Trendyol Party) and a casual jeans collection (Trendyol Denim) to modest fashion looks (Trendyol Modest) and a plus-size collection (Trendyol Curve)."

Now it’s your turn to embrace your unique style from casual and relaxed to elegant and stylish with on-trend fashion pieces for women, men, and kids from Trendyol Collection. Beyond our exclusive brand Trendyol Collection, we also feature some of your most-loved brands such as: Nike, New Balance, Birkenstock, Crocs, Ray-Ban, Skechers, Adidas, Apple, Korkmaz, Samsung, Philips, Almufarrej, Karaca, Home Box, Dyson, Stanley, Lego, Madame Coco, Xiaomi, NA-KD, Converse, Jack & Jones, Dr. Martens, Calvin Klein and more.

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Trendyol app. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.
