Beyond our exclusive brand Trendyol Collection, we also feature some of your most-loved brands such as: Nike, New Balance, Birkenstock, Crocs, Ray-Ban, Skechers, Adidas, Apple, Korkmaz, Samsung, Philips, Almufarrej, Karaca, Home Box, Dyson, Stanley, Lego, Madame Coco, Xiaomi, NA-KD, Converse, Jack & Jones, Dr. Martens, Calvin Klein and more.

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Trendyol app. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

apps.title: Klarna | Pay your way
apps.description:
FLEXIBLE WAYS TO PAY
Choose to pay in 4 interest-free payments, pay the full amount, in 30 days or over time.¹

SHOP ANYWHERE IN THE KLARNA APP
Access Klarna's flexible payment options anywhere - shop at your favorite stores and split your purchase with the payment plan that suits you.

UP TO 10% CASHBACK
Shop in the app and earn up to 10% cashback.² Get cashback at hundreds of stores in the app.

SHOP WITH THE KLARNA CARD³
Pay with Klarna anywhere Visa is accepted. Pay now or pay later with the card. No fees and no credit impact to apply.

UNLOCK YOUR KLARNA BALANCE
Add money in the Klarna app and pay flexibly, everywhere. Plus, get instant refunds and receive cashback directly to your balance.⁴

USE KLARNA WITH APPLE PAY
Split the cost with Klarna on Apple Pay, available in-store and online.⁵

FIND THE BEST PRICE, EVERY TIME
Search for any product and instantly compare prices across stores.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK ALL YOUR DELIVERIES
Get real-time updates, arrival times, and pickup photos—right in the Klarna app.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use our chat in the Klarna app for 24/7 support. 

¹Monthly financing through Klarna issued by WebBank. Other CA resident loans made or arranged pursuant to a California Financing Law license. NMLS #1353190.
²Earn cashback on Klarna App purchases. Klarna balance account required and funds can only be used within Klarna. Cashback issuance depends on store approval and may be affected by cookie settings, combining offers, product exclusions, or other factors beyond our control. Klarna may get a commission. Limitations, terms and conditions apply.
³Deposits in your balance account are held at WebBank, Member FDIC. Klarna is not an FDIC-insured bank and deposit insurance only covers the failure of WebBank. Your deposits in the balance account are eligible for pass-through deposit insurance coverage if certain conditions are satisfied. Funds may be made available to you before WebBank receives them (“early availability funds”); such early availability funds may not be FDIC insured until received by WebBank. Loans that you obtain using the Klarna Card not insured by the FDIC and are not deposits. Account disclosures.
Use your card anywhere Visa is accepted. Certain merchant, product, good and service restrictions apply. Some merchants do not accept virtual cards. Physical card only included with a paid Klarna Membership Plan.
⁴Terms and Conditions apply to gift certificates/gift cards like Klarna Balance.
⁵Paying over time on Apple Pay: Loans not offered by Apple. Subject to eligibility requirements and approval. Not available in all markets, and may not be available for all types of purchases, such as subscriptions and recurring transactions. Available with Apple Pay online and in app, on iPhone and iPad. Not available in-store. Software requirements apply. Additional terms may apply. For more eligibility and feature details, see https://support.apple.com/120477.
Apple Pay is a service provided by Apple Payments Services LLC, a subsidiary of Apple Inc. Neither Apple Inc. nor Apple Payments Services LLC is a bank. Any card used in Apple Pay is offered by the card issuer.

raw_data.releaseNotes: The Klarna app puts you in control of your payments, making it easy to manage every purchase in one place. Enjoy flexible payment options that let you shop anywhere—even at stores not partnered with Klarna—and pay in a way that fits your budget. Earn up to 10% cashback on your purchases, view upcoming payments, and stay organized with real-time updates. We've also made some minor updates and fixes.

apps.title: noon Shopping, Food, Grocery
apps.description:
Welcome to noon - the best shopping app in UAE, Saudi Arabia and Egypt. From mobiles to home appliances, beauty, fashion, electronics, everyday grocery essentials, fast food delivery, and more, noon is the best online shopping app for all your shopping needs.

MOBILES, BEAUTY, HOME, FURNITURE, FASHION, BABY PRODUCTS, GIFTS & MORE

Browse our online shopping app to find a huge range of fashion essentials in our online clothing store, along with footwear, accessories like bags and luggage, and more. Enjoy the best mobile phones online shopping with phones to suit your budget. Look your best with a range of beauty must-haves. Browse our baby shopping store online to find a range of toys & products for your little one. Update your space with our online furniture store app. Find the perfect Ramadan gifts for loved ones. 

SHOP TOP BRANDS

Shop laptops, computers and accessories from Apple Macbook Pro and Air, HP, Lenovo, Dell, and Asus; mobile phones and accessories from Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, Realme, and OnePlus; audio video products from Samsung, LG, Hisense, and TCL;  headsets and headphones from Apple, JBL, Sony, and Soundcore; video game consoles and accessories from Sony, Nintendo, Asus, Logitech, and Microsoft; wearables from Apple, Samsung and Huawei; home appliances and homeware from NKX, Fashion Home, Home Box, Arabest, Syngenta, Geepas, Black + Decker, Samsung, and Nikai; apparel from Adidas, Nike and Meishida; eyewear and watches for men and women from Casio, Fossil, Tommy Hilfiger, RayBan, and Lacoste; and beauty and haircare from Maybelline New York, L'Oreal, La Roche Posay, Garnier, and Cerave.

AUTHENTIC BRANDS, INSTANT RETURNS & 2X REFUNDS WITH NOON SUPERMALL

Shop a huge range of branded products with supermall. supermall offers products from premium authentic brands, scheduled fast returns and 2x refund. Get delivery in just 60 minutes and enjoy the best customer experience with supermall.

ORDER FOOD ONLINE WITH NOON FOOD

No time to go to the restaurant? Looking for fast food delivery? Order food online and get instant delivery with the noon food ordering app. Our online food delivery app is fast and easy to use. Enjoy your favourite dishes with instant delivery from 10,000+ restaurants, 100+ cuisines with exciting discounts.
  
GET FAST DELIVERY WITH NOON MINUTES & NOON NOWNOW

Stock your pantry and order fresh groceries online. Our fast grocery delivery app NowNow offers products from supermarkets and pharmacies like Spinneys, VIVA Supermarket, Choithrams, Aster Pharmacy and others. Enjoy instant delivery to make grocery online shopping fast and simple. Choose Express delivery for fast delivery at noon or shop with noon supermall for instant delivery, 2x refunds, easy returns and products from authentic brands.

UNLIMITED FREE DELIVERY & EXCLUSIVE DEALS WITH NOON ONE

Get unlimited free delivery on noon, instant delivery on noon Food and noon NowNow, exclusive deals, and more at just 25 AED per month. Get fast, free next-day delivery through express and fast delivery services with no minimum orders and fast and free same-day delivery on all orders over 100 AED. 

EXCLUSIVE DEALS & COUPONS

Enjoy online deals, offers, vouchers, promo codes and other ways to save when shopping at the noon online shopping store. Save with 11.11 sales, Yellow Friday deals, Ramadan specials, daily deals on fresh groceries and more.

WORLD-CLASS SHOPPING EXPERIENCE

Get instant access to our deals and discount shopping store. Enjoy free and fast delivery, exclusive deals, discounts, coupon codes and more. Save products to your wishlist and enjoy other in-app features. Shop authentic branded products with noon supermall.

MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS 

Pay with cash on delivery, credit or debit cards, or choose split payments over 4–12 months with Tabby and Tamara’s Buy Now, Pay Later plans. Enjoy peace of mind with our No-Cost EMI and 15-day return policy.

Download the best online shopping app now.

apps.title: Flipkart - Online Shopping App
apps.description:
About the App:
Flipkart brings you the thrill of discovery with a treasure trove of products—mobiles, fashion, electronics, home appliances, groceries, and more. It's your one-stop shop with amazing discounts, SuperCoins on every purchase, fun rewards, and timely deal alerts. A new addition is Flipkart Minutes, where you get everything you need delivered in just 10 minutes! All wrapped in one app built for your ultimate convenience. Explore it all in your language.
Flipkart Minutes: Forgot to grab the groceries? Need a last-minute gift? Prepping for a party? Or just realized you’re out of your favorite snacks? Flipkart Minutes delivers everything you need & want in just 10 minutes! From the freshest fruits & veggies to the latest gadgets daily essentials & more—we've got it all at UNBEATABLE prices.
Spoyl: The ultimate Gen-Z fashion hub. Expect fresh drops, LIT trends, and genderless styles that let you be unapologetically you. Spoyl yourself and be the trendsetter in your squad!
Grocery: Skip the queue, save on fuel, and get groceries delivered to your doorstep. Just remember, it’s better to order a day in advance—not when you’re mid-chutney and missing a chilli! Living life by the minute isn’t scalable.
Personal loans: Get flexible EMIs, affordable rates, and a seamless experience that makes loan approvals easier and faster than ever.
Vibes: Turn online shopping into an experience that feels as real as being in the store, all from the comfort of your couch.
Easy on the eyes, easier to navigate—our new design puts everything you need right where you want it.
Group Buy: Shop together, save together. Because sharing is caring!
Brand Mall: Love the mall but prefer your living room? Explore our premium brands collection without leaving your couch.
Tailor-made recommendations and trending stores, designed to get even better when you’re logged in. Give it a try and let us know how we did!
A regional language experience that feels like home, no matter where you are.
Faster than ever before—our engineers have outdone themselves this time.
Update the app and discover how we’ve crafted something for everyone, with you at the heart of it all.
 
_________________________________
 
*Note on Personal Loans*
 
Scapic Innovations Pvt Ltd (SuperMoney) is a Flipkart Group financial technology company. Scapic Innovations Pvt Ltd only provides a platform to facilitate money lending by Regulated Entities viz. registered Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFCs) or Banks to users and is acting as an Loan Service Provider in partnership with Axis Bank & IDFC Bank. 
Loan tenures offered by the lenders vary from 6 months up to 72 months. The rates start from 10.5% and may go up to 33%. Loan amount ranges from Rs 5000 up to Rs 10L. Interest rates and loan amounts are determined by the lenders basis customer profile and not Scapic or Flipkart. 
Sample working is shown below
 
Representative Example:
Loan Amount
Rs 102008
Processing Fee (Including 18% GST)
Rs 2407
Stamp Duty
Rs 20
Net Disbursal Amount
Rs 99581
Interest Rate
20.50%
Monthly EMI
Rs 6631
Loan Period
18 months
First Emi date
10/12/2023*
Last Emi date
10/05/2025*
*Subject to change based on disbursal date
 
Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) :  33%
Interest rates available on the platform are provided by the lending partner (NBFC or Bank) that is approving the loan. The rates vary depending on the customer profile based on credit score and other factors, as per lenders.
 
Privacy Policy
https://www.flipkart.com/pages/scapic-privacy-policy
Scapic T&C
https://www.flipkart.com/pages/scapic-tnc
 
Partner Links:
https://www.idfcfirstbank.com/personal-banking/adlp/digital-lending-partners/scapic-innovations
https://www.axisbank.com/retail/loans/personal-loan/personal-loan-lsp
_____________________________________
If you have more ideas on how we can solve for India or find a bug you’d like to bring to our attention, drop a note to app-feedback@flipkart.com.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Each year we drop a lot of features that make life easier for everyday Indians. From building new ways to shop with Vibes, helping you find answers through Flippi - our chatbot, launching personal loans with easy EMIs, expanding our categories to Home Services, Vehicles, E-books, & more. Our newest addition is Flipkart Minutes, where you get everything from fresh fruits & veggies to daily essentials to electronics in just 10 mins! We also have THE fashion destination for our Gen Z fam, Spoyl.

apps.title: Jane - Boutique Shopping Deals
apps.description:
Jane – Boutique Shopping Deals
 
Discover Jane, the ultimate marketplace for daily finds from small boutiques and big brands, all in one place! With the Jane app, your shopping experience is personalized, stylish, and always on-trend.
 
Features:
- 2,000+ Small Shops to Explore -
Shop unique pieces and new finds from thousands of women-owned businesses and boutiques in clothing, home décor, kids' items, and more. There's always something new to discover!

- Big Brands & Designer Deals -
Access exclusive savings on must-have styles from the top brands you know and love.

- One Seamless Marketplace -
Find your favorite deals, the latest trends, or that one-of-a-kind item you can’t wait to show off. Every purchase ships right to your door for a convenient, worry-free experience.

Feedback Welcome

We update frequently to keep your shopping fast, easy, and on point.

apps.title: Starbucks
apps.description:
Ordering ahead is just a download away. Get the Starbucks® app for an easier, more rewarding way to enjoy your faves. Why wait?

Tap Into Easy Ordering
Order ahead in the app, then just pick up and go. Starbucks® Rewards members can also save custom drinks and preferred payment methods, view previous orders, and bookmark stores for a quick and seamless ordering experience.

Earn Free Food & Drinks
Join Starbucks® Rewards to start earning Stars toward fun freebies like food and drinks and a birthday treat.* Want to get to free faster? Earn Bonus Stars through exciting challenges and games.

Scan to Pay in Stores
No wallet? No worries. Checkout is fast and simple when you pay with the Starbucks® app—and you'll earn Rewards along the way.

Send eGifts to Friends
Send eGifts to friends via email, a text message or your favorite messaging app. Choose from a variety of unique designs for every occasion.

Find a Store
See stores near you, get directions and hours, and view store amenities like drive-thru and Starbucks Wi-Fi before you make the trip.

Tip Your Barista
Leave a tip on purchases made with the app at many stores in the U.S.

*At participating stores. Restrictions apply. See starbucks.com/terms for program details. To qualify for the Birthday Reward, you must have made at least one Star-earning transaction prior to your birthday each year.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We made some changes to make things run smoothly.

apps.title: The Home Depot
apps.description:
It’s a good time to be a doer.
DIY IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND
Save time with The Home Depot app. Shop over one million products and find the info you need most.
SNAP A PICTURE, FIND WHAT YOU NEED
Don’t know what something’s called? Just snap a picture and let our Image Search feature tell you.
A GPS FOR YOUR SHOPPING LIST
Use the Product Locator to find what you’re looking for and check store inventory. We'll take you to the exact aisle and bay.
MAKE INFORMED BUYING DECISIONS
Get Ratings & Reviews in a matter of seconds. Use the barcode reader to scan an item and read what other customers have to say.

apps.title: Vinted: Shop & sell pre-loved
apps.description:
The idea is simple: you sell your pre-loved stuff to other members who’ll love it again. They get the thrill of unboxing a great find, you get more space at home. It's look-good, do-good, feel-good, for everyone. 

Selling is easy and free
Snap photos of your item, describe it, and set your price. You keep 100% of what you earn.  
• Cash in on your pre-loved clothes and more. 
• Watch your earnings grow. Send your money straight to your bank account. 
• Buyers cover shipping costs. You get prepaid labels that make things simple. 

Shop new-again finds 				
Feel proud of your second-hand discoveries, from clothes to accessories. 
• Fast finds, long-lasting love. There’s a Vinted category for almost everything, use filters to speed up shopping. 
• We’ve got your back. When you buy on Vinted, we cover you with Buyer Protection. For a small fee, you’ll get a refund if your item is lost, damaged in delivery, or significantly not as described. 
• Choose a shipping carrier and have your order sent to your home or a convenient pickup location.  

There’s a diverse community of second-hand enthusiasts waiting to meet you. Chat with your fellow members, get updates, and manage your orders all in one place. 

Come join us
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@vinted 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vinted
Find out more in our Help Center: https://www.vinted.com/help

apps.title: Myntra - Fashion Shopping App
apps.description:
Swipe, select & shop! It’s a fashion store on the go with the Myntra Mobile App. Shop for clothing, footwear, accessories and home furnishing for men, women and kids. Get all your favourite fashion brands and collections at the click of a button.


Guaranteed 100% original products, hassle-free returns or exchanges, secure payments, EMI options. Also get great sign-up benefits and free shipping on your first order.

Browse through 5 Lakh + products from 2500 brands instantly on the Myntra shopping app. Explore the latest trends in lifestyle and shop from the biggest clothing store for Kurtis, Sarees, Shoes, T-shirts, Jackets, Jeans, Bags, Skirts, Dresses, Jewellery, Watches, Wallets, Footwear, Home Furnishing and much more.

The online collection of products includes

•Men's shopping -  Watches, suits, shoes, T-shirts, shirts, trousers, gym wear, backpacks, wallets, sunglasses, casual shoes, sneakers, smartwatches, headphones, sports shoes from brands like Puma, Adidas, Nike, Reebok, Casio, Levis, Pepe, Fastrack, Hugo Boss, Raymonds, Wills Lifestyle, John Players, WROGN, HRX, Roadster, Flying Machine, Fossil, Red Tape & more

• Women's shopping - Sarees, anarkalis, dresses, lingerie, party wear, watches, shrugs, jumpsuit, kurtis, tops, heels, sandals, sneakers, handbags,  accessories, jewellery, lipsticks, make-up, personal care & more. Shop from top brands like Forever 21, All About You, MANGO, Only, AND, W, Biba, Next, Vero Moda, Roadster, Esprit, Dressberry, Libas, AKS, Catwalk, Inc 5, Lavie, Hidesign, Michael Kors, Daniel Klein & more

• Kid's shopping – Girl’s tops,  girl’s sandals, girl’s leggings, girl’s dresses, girl’s footwear, girl’s accessories, boy’s T-shirts, boy’s shorts, boy’s trousers, boy’s shirts, boy’s footwear, kid’s bags, kid’s winterwear. Shop from top brands like Gini & Jony, United Colors of Benetton, U.S. Polo Assn. Kids, Mothercare, Mini Club, adidas, Allen Solly Junior, Lilliput, Next, Puma, The Children’s Place


• Home Furnishing - Bedsheets, cushion covers, blankets, towels, curtains, pillow covers, bath rugs & home décor. Shop from brands like Swayam, Spaces, Raymonds, & Portico New York.

APP FEATURES

•Find products you love: Choose from a vast collection of over 5 Lakhs styles for men, women, teens & kids on our online clothing store

•Refine your search based on popularity, discount, prices, colours, sizes & more using sort & filter features

•Avail massive discounts: Get products at their best prices with integrated Myntra coupon codes in your account.  Get notifications on best deals & offers

•Fast & secure checkout: Pay by cash-on-delivery, net banking or choose credit/ debit card options

•View detailed product information with rich images & style notes from our fashion editors

•Log-in seamlessly using Facebook & Google

•Promise of timely delivery backed by an extensive delivery network

•Wishlist collections: Save styles for later by adding to your wishlist straight from the app

•Sharing made easy: Get style suggestions from your friends by sharing on WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, & email

•Refer your friends & get huge benefits

•Keep Active with Myntra Move: Get rewarded for tracking your steps on Myntra Move. The steps are tracked using your phone's Apple Health app.

apps.title: Next: Shop Fashion & Homeware
apps.description:
The hottest brands, the latest trends: find them all here. Enjoy an amazing shopping experience at home or on the go with the upgraded Next app. 

Whether you’re shopping schoolwear for the new term, hunting for the perfect outfit for a special occasion or deciding how to switch up your living room, there’s something for everyone. And with 1000s of products across fashion, home and beauty, we truly mean it. 

THE ULTIMATE STYLE DESTINATION 
In a hurry? From fit to colour, occasion to brand, use our innovative search filters to find your perfect fit in a flash, then place your order in a few simple clicks. And if you’re not 100% sure, simply add your item to your Favourites to save it for later. We’re just as passionate about style as you are, so expect plenty of recommendations along the way for you to peruse. 

PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Be the very first to know about new brand arrivals, upcoming sales, limited-time offers and items now back in stock with push notifications directly to your mobile device. 

TRACK EVERY ORDER 
Our Order Tracking function will make sure you know where your order is from the moment it leaves our warehouse to the second it’s delivered to your local store or direct to your front door, with detailed information on what you’ll be expecting, and when. 

FAVOURITES
Save your favourites at the click of a button – and all in one place – with our one-tap heart feature. Keep track of your saved styles, add or remove them from your list, and check if your size is in stock.

We want to hear from you 
Read our product ratings and reviews from 1000s of other customers, and let us know where we can improve by reviewing the app. Our customers are the heart of everything we do, so we really appreciate your feedback.

raw_data.releaseNotes: It's time for another update! We've made some improvements behind the scenes and fixed a few bugs to make shopping with Next even easier.

apps.title: Banggood Global Online Shop
apps.description:
Welcome to Banggood, your ultimate online shopping platform for high quality products at unbeatable prices!

As a leading global online shop, Banggood offers highly cost-effective, well-selected products. Millions of items ranging from consumer electronics, toys, sports gear, home appliances, and tools to clothing, all delivered to your door with just a few clicks.

Popular categories on Banggood app are:
◉Toys Hobbies & Robots: Dive into your hobbies with our exciting toys.
◉Sports & Outdoor: Get equipped for electric riding and outdoor sports activities.
◉Electronics: Explore phones, smartwatches, headphones, speakers, keyboards & more on top brands.
◉Automobiles & Motorcycles: Complete range of car electronics & gadgets for safer & smarter driving.
◉Tools: Cost-effective equipment & tools for DIYers and professionals.


Benefits for You:
◉New User Gifts: Enjoy up to $25 off for your first purchase.
◉Safe & Easy Purchase: Over 40 in-app payment methods. Support Klarna to pay in 4 interest-free payments. Or shop first & pay in 30 days without interest.
◉Easy to Use: Save your favorite items for quick access, receive updates on discounts, and easily manage and track your orders via the app.
◉Global Shipping: Benefit from our 37 global warehouses and international shipping partnerships, providing you with a fast and efficient shipping experience.
◉24/7 Customer Service: Enjoy professional support in multiple languages. Our live chat service ensures you’re always in good hands.

Keep in touch

AUTHENTICITY GUARANTEED
LazMall – Lazada's flagship offering for branded products ensure genuine, authentic brands – sold by brands on Lazada through Brand Stores. 100% Authentic – Directly from brands to you. Enjoy 10,000+ global brands at your fingertips like Nike, Adidas, Maybelline, L'Oréal, and more. 

FIRST ORDER BENEFITS
Get exclusive discount vouchers for your first purchase*. Get coins when you check in daily, and collect vouchers from Lazada and sellers every time you use the Lazada app! *T&Cs Apply

Pay securely through multiple payment options; 
1. Cash on Delivery

Shopping is made easy for you. Lazada uses superior products recommendation algorithm to ensure personalized products, deals, and vouchers created just for YOU.

BUYER GUARANTEE
Check out the product reviews, see the seller ratings, and CHAT WITH SELLERS directly! Dissatisfied? Simply return for a full refund via the simple returns policies.

LAZFLASH & VOUCHERS
Shop more and save more with exclusive app-only offers, promo codes, bank vouchers, and discounts at the best prices, updated every day. 

BEST CATEGORIES
Enjoy effortless online shopping and home delivery coming from a huge variety of products in electronics, sports, beauty, digital, groceries, toys, cars & motorcycles, shoes, fragrances, health, men's & women's fashion, and much more.

apps.title: Meesho: Online Shopping
apps.description:
Meesho: Online Shopping App
Shop from our quality products across fashion, home essentials, beauty, and more — all at affordable prices on the Meesho app. Whether you're refreshing your wardrobe or upgrading your home, Meesho makes online shopping simple, affordable, and fun. 

Why Shop on Meesho 
1. Quality Products at Affordable  Prices Discover fashion, home & kitchen, kids & baby care, beauty & personal care products — all at prices that fit your budget. 
2. Free Delivery on Every Order Enjoy free shipping with no minimum order value. 
3. Cash On Delivery (COD) Available Pay only when you receive your products.
4. Easy Returns and Refunds 7-day free returns with refund policy — no questions asked. 
5. Safe & Secure Payments Your online transactions are protected with trusted payment gateways and encrypted security.
 
How to Shop on Meesho 
Download the App and explore trending products. 
Add to Cart and choose from our trusted sellers.
Select Payment Method — COD or secure online payment.
Get Fast, Free Delivery right to your doorstep. 

Want to Start Selling Too?
Meesho also empowers individuals and small businesses to grow online. Easily list your products, manage orders, and reach millions of customers across India — all from the same app. Whether you shop or sell, Meesho helps you save more and earn more — your all-in-one destination for online shopping in India.

apps.title: Centrepoint online shopping
apps.description:
Get Ready for an Unforgettable Shopping Experience with Centrepoint!
The White Wednesday Sale is here — enjoy up to 70% off on over 400,000 products! Dive into a world of exclusive offers at Centrepoint! Explore a carefully curated selection of women’s dresses, stylish footwear, men’s clothing, kids’ essentials, and so much more—crafted to suit every occasion and elevate your style. Whether you're refreshing your wardrobe, upgrading your home decor, or shopping for the little ones, Centrepoint offers a seamless and unique shopping experience that caters to your every need!

The Centrepoint app brings you closer to online shopping with over 500 popular brands and 220,000+ products for the entire family. Discover fashion for women, men, and kids, alongside beauty and makeup products, home decor essentials, and must-have Back to School items. Shop your favorite global brands, including Adidas, Puma, Skechers, Disney, Barbie, Jack & Jones, and Lee Cooper, all in one place. Our extensive collection ensures there’s something for everyone, from trendy outfits to timeless classics.

Shop online with ease from KSA, UAE, Kuwait, Qatar, Bahrain, and Oman. Take advantage of the region’s largest Click and Collect and home delivery network, designed for your convenience. Choose from a variety of secure payment options and enjoy hassle-free returns. Download the Centrepoint app now and step into a world of style and savings!

Why wait? Download the Centrepoint app today to unlock the best deals, exclusive discounts, flexible payment methods, Click and Collect services, fast and reliable home delivery, and a smooth return process. Elevate your shopping game with Centrepoint’s unparalleled convenience and variety.

Why You’ll Love the Centrepoint App:

A Memorable First Shopping Experience
New users are in for a treat with exclusive offers and discounts! Use code 15CP to enjoy 15% off your first order and kickstart your shopping journey with incredible savings.

“Shukran” for Being Amazing
Earn exciting rewards as you shop online with Shukran, our award-winning loyalty program. Every purchase brings you closer to exclusive benefits and perks.

Everything at Your Fingertips
Click to explore fashion. Click to discover shopping happiness. With the Centrepoint app, your next favorite purchase is just a tap away.

Top Brands, Here and Nowhere Else
In addition to our exclusive in-house brands, we offer a curated selection of top global brands available online, ensuring you have access to the best in fashion and lifestyle.

Click & Collect
Shop and pay online, then collect your order from any of our 135+ stores across the region at no extra cost. It’s fast, convenient, and tailored to your schedule.

Pay Your Way
Choose from flexible payment options, including Visa, MasterCard, Cash on Delivery, Apple Pay, or Shukran points, to make your shopping experience as smooth as possible.

Home Delivery
Shop, relax, and let us deliver your order straight to your doorstep. Our reliable delivery service ensures your purchases arrive quickly and securely.

Easy Returns
Not satisfied? Return items within 14 days with ease. You can even drop them off at one of our conveniently located stores for added convenience.

No More Missing Out
Download the Centrepoint app, enable notifications, and stay in the loop with new product launches, exclusive online deals, and limited-time offers. Never miss a chance to save big!

Contact us: support@centrepointstores.com

apps.title: boohooMAN: Shop Men’s Clothing
apps.description:
Stay one step ahead with the boohooMAN app, bringing you all the latest must-have menswear styles. Score unbeatable deals on men's fashion, from streetwear and tracksuits to going-out gear we’ve always got you covered, plus with our live order tracking, you can trace your new clothes right to your doorstep. Get ready to up your fashion game with these trending outfits that will have you turning heads wherever you go. Pick up some statement trousers, hoodies and printed t-shirts, we've got an outfit for every vibe. It’s time to update your stash with our seasonal selections. We've got 100's of fiercely fresh men's styles and they're just waiting for you to snap 'em up.

Download the boohooMAN app now to access exclusive content, deals and games, shop the newest men’s fashion at the touch of a button with our fast and secure checkout, or search and save your favourite looks for later in your wish list.
Take full advantage of:
 
• Exclusive content – stay up to date on all things active, the latest drops & more.
• boohooMAN Premier – get Unlimited Next Day Delivery for a year and exclusive offers.
• Fast and secure checkout - shop the latest drip with speed and ease.
• Track your order – track it to your door.
• Wishlist – lock it down for later.
• Notifications – hear about exclusive offers and the latest collections before anyone else.

apps.description:
The Middle East’s Definitive Home of Luxury. Shop women, men and kids clothing, shoes, bags, accessories, fine jewellery, beauty and home from the best international and local designers. 

Why our customers shop at Ounass:
2-hour delivery in Dubai 
Free delivery and returns (T&Cs apply)
The best offers and exclusive sales (enable Push Notifications to be alerted)
Apple Pay for fast and easy checkout
Over 2,000 luxury brands

Luxury packaging

Ounass launched 15.12.2016 as Al Tayer Group’s first, exclusively digital, luxury e-commerce site. The Definitive Home of Luxury, Ounass boasts the widest range of top-tier designers throughout the Middle East. 

Ounass is dedicated to impeccable local talent and local service alike, currently operating exclusively within the Middle East. Based in the new capital of fashion, Dubai, we provide a 2-hour delivery service within Dubai as well as express delivery to GCC countries. 

Our extensive array of evening gowns and coveted seasonal pieces will arrive in our elegant signature packaging. An easy returns procedure can be coordinated by our exceptional Customer Care team (available from 10am-10pm, 7 days a week). You can also benefit from our complimentary Personal Shopping service which is tailored to suit your specific needs.

apps.title: Tabby | Shop Now. Pay Later
apps.description:
SHOP NOW. PAY LATER
Tabby lets you shop what you love and split purchases into four monthly payments — with no interest, no hidden fees and no surprises. Whether you're shopping online or in store, Tabby gives you control, financial flexibility and peace of mind.

SHOP FROM TOP BRANDS
Discover and shop your favorite brands including AMAZON, SHEIN, IKEA, ADIDAS, SIVVI, CENTREPOINT, and many more in one shopping app. The Tabby app is your one-stop shopping destination, packed with fashion, electronics, home goods, makeup, and more.

COMPARE PRICES & SAVE MONEY
Track price drops and compare products across multiple stores. With smart alerts, you’ll always get the best deal — your personal price-checker, built right in.

NEW DEALS AND DISCOUNTS EVERY DAY
Shop daily discounts, coupons and promotions from top brands. Never miss a deal — just open the app and see what’s new.

FIND NEARBY STORES THAT ACCEPT TABBY
Use our in-store map to discover shops and malls that accept Tabby. Try before you buy and still pay later. Search by brand, category or location.

ONE APP FOR ALL YOUR SHOPPING
Manage payments, track purchases, get reminders and explore new brands — all in one app.

PROTECT YOUR PURCHASE WITH TABBY CARE
Tabby Care adds extra peace of mind. It covers your purchases, makes returns easy and protects your order every step of the way.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use chat in the Tabby app for round-the-clock support.

Tabby gives you the freedom to pay later with no interest, no fees and no surprises — so you can shop on your terms.

Follow us to stay up-to-date on new stores and latest deals:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tabbypay/

X: https://x.com/paywithtabby/

Need help? Reach out to http://help.tabby.ai/

raw_data.releaseNotes: We chased down the sneaky bugs, gave them the eyebrow raise, and—POW!—they’re gone. The app’s smoother, faster, and ready for your next move. Pay in 4 with Tabby

apps.description:
Welcome to the party! Zappos is your one-stop shop for shoes, clothing, bags, accessories, and so much more! We strive to provide an easy, helpful shopping experience, so you can stress less.

WHY ZAPPOS?
• FREE shipping and returns—no minimum purchase required
• 24/7 customer service (friendly and ready to help!)
• Huge selection of top brands, styles, sizes, and widths

WHY THE ZAPPOS APP?
• Intuitive search and filter options
• High-quality product images and videos
• Personalized recommendations
• Secure checkout with multiple payment options
• Notifications so you never miss a moment
• Easy returns management

ARE YOU READY TO GET OUTFITTED? WE CAN HELP!
• Shoes: Sneakers, running shoes, boots, sandals, heels, and flats
• Clothing: On-trend and classic styles for women, men, and kids
• Bags: From clutches and shoulder bags to luggage and backpacks
• Accessories: Watches, jewelry, sunglasses, and more to complete your look

WE ARE AN OFFICIAL RETAILER FOR THE WORLD'S MOST POPULAR BRANDS:

DOWNLOAD ZAPPOS NOW AND ENJOY:

Zappos helps you stay focused on your goals without sacrificing style. Explore HOKA shoes and On running for your workouts. Plus, find UGG® boots and slippers or Birkenstock sandals and clogs for your daily grind.

apps.title: AJIO Online Shopping App
apps.description:
WELCOME TO YOUR AISE OF STYLE

We get it—you live and breathe fashion, and the thrill of online shopping is your jam. AJIO is here to keep your style game strong no matter where you are. Whether it’s on-trend clothing, killer footwear, must-have accessories, beauty and personal care essentials, the latest tech gadgets, or contemporary home furnishing & décor — AJIO's got your back.  

We know you’re busy, so we keep it snappy. Our curated fashion experience guarantees high-quality products that make your life easy and stylish. 

No more waiting for sales—We bring you fab finds online and the best of trends at lowest prices every day. Shop whenever you want and enjoy free delivery* 

Trendsetter alert: AJIO’s collection is fashion-forward, showcasing the freshest designs for men & women, from around the globe. 

Wardrobe woes? Solved! AJIO’s exclusive online shopping experience includes top international brands you wouldn’t find anywhere else, along with high-quality labels that are unique and on-trend, presenting head-to-toe style solutions for men, women and kids.  

Craftsmanship meets cool: Our Indie collection supports artisans, blending tradition with contemporary vibes. If you’re looking for authentic ethnic clothes and high-quality products, look no further.  

World-class brands: Get access to a range featuring the largest and exclusive international brands like ASOS, H&M, GAP, Superdry, Armani Exchange, Nike, Puma, Adidas, Muji and a lot more!  

Curated collection just for you: Our capsule collections are handpicked to elevate your personal look, no matter the occasion. Shop a trending fit for every mood and find the perfect product at lowest prices. 

Tech-savvy & stylish: Because your gadgets should look as good as you do, we offer the best in electronics, tech accessories and gadgets. 

Beauty for every you: From skincare to haircare, makeup to grooming must-haves, luxe international beauty brands, we’ve got you covered.  

Shop easy: Enjoy free delivery on your first purchase* and a 15-day hassle-free return policy when you indulge in online shopping on AJIO.  

Download & Go: Get the AJIO app and experience the best of fashion, tech, beauty and trends. Wherever you are, your next look is just a tap away. Get, set, shop!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
AJIO Rush Delivery: Get select products delivered within 4–6 hours in eligible pincodes for a faster shopping experience.
GST Billing: Business users can now add their GST number during checkout to avail exclusive benefits.
Performance Improvements: Enjoy a smoother, faster, and more reliable app experience with the latest bug fixes and enhancements.

apps.title: Blidz - Shop Deals, Earn Money
apps.description:
Looking for cool products with the best prices among all online shops? Join thousands of users at Blidz, the new social shopping app, with millions of trending products from Apple to Xiaomi.

How can we offer brand products at the lowest prices anywhere? It's all because of you! Instead of spending money on marketing we invest in you by slashing prices. No middlemen + no mark-ups + no marketing expenses = best prices possible.

TOGETHER, YOU SAVE - BLIDZ TEAM BUY
At Blidz, we reward you for sharing your purchases with your friends. Team Buy allow you to get the most value-for-money with discounts of 90% or more. It’s super simple: when you see a product you want, choose to buy it with a friend. Ta-da! You and your friend just saved $$$ on a quality product together (for example iPhones or TVs).

BLITZ THE COMPETITION & TAKE ADVANTAGE OF INCREDIBLE DEALS
Blidz is much more than just another boring shopping app. It’s as if you’re going to the mall together with your friends, just online. Inside awaits a fun playground with the best deals - making the shopping experience more exciting. 

WHY IS BLIDZ SO AFFORDABLE OR EVEN FREE?
We believe in our users instead of spending money on marketing. By sharing Blidz, YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to buy more deals at better discounts!

DOES BLIDZ REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS?
You want it, we got it! Browse through millions of trending products from high-end electronics and gadgets to jewellery and fashion. All products are sourced without middle-men from top-tier brands like Apple and Xiaomi. To support you in your shopping experience, we have a 100% secure payment system, customer-friendly return policy and lightning-fast support to help you cash in on the best deals.

CORE FEATURES
 • Free starter pack
 • Millions of available products
 • Best price guarantee amongst all online shops
 • Point rewards
 • Personalized product selection 
 • 100% secure & fully encrypted payments methods: PayPal & all major credit cards
 • Fast-delivery and express shipping options
 • 30-day guaranteed return policy 
 • Lightning fast support - contact us at support@blidz.com 

PRODUCT CATEGORIES
 • Consumer Electronics (smartphones, tablets, cases, chargers etc.)
 • Home products (decor, kitchenware, home appliances etc.)
 • Fashion (men’s, women’s and children’s for every occasion)
 • Jewelry (earrings, necklaces, rings etc.)
 • Accessories (Hats, gloves, stockings etc.)
 • Outdoor & Sports (Camping, fishing, etc.)
 • Mother & Kids products (Toys, functional equipment, etc.)
 • Beauty products (makeup, skincare, hair styling, etc.)
 • Garden and outdoor (Tools, picnic & BBQ, etc.)
 • Office supplies (stationery, office shelves etc.)
 • DIY (electric parts, industrial tools, automotive parts etc.)
 • Pet products (pet toys, clothing, shelters, etc.)

Privacy Policy:
https://intercom.help/blidz/en/articles/8311900-blidz-privacy-policy

https://intercom.help/blidz/en/articles/8304611-blidz-membership-terms-of-service-tos

Official Payout Spin Rules
https://intercom.help/blidz/en/articles/9748634-official-payout-spin-rules

apps.title: Brands For Less - Shopping App
apps.description:
Brands for Less, offering women's and men's fashion from high quality designer brands, all at up to 80% less than the retail price. Brands For Less became a trend in the online shopping industry and was the main factor behind the success and expansion of the Brands For Less group.

Download Brands For Less and shop for:


Men’s Fashion: Brands For Less is home to over 3,000 brands and offers a wide collection of clothing like casual shirts, dress shirts, hoodies & sweatshirts, jackets & outerwear and many more, in addition to personal care & grooming, shoes and accessories for men.


Women’s Fashion: Brands For Less offers a large collection of branded women’s clothing, including Bodysuit Dresses, Hoodies, sweatshirts, Jackets, Outerwear, Jeans and many more.


Kid's Fashion: Brands For Less also offers products from the top kids fashion brands with a large collection of kids clothing, Accessories, Dresses, Hoodies & Sweatshirts, Jackets & Outerwear, Leggings & Tights, Pants & Jeans, Skirts & Shorts, Sleepwear and more.


Sportswear: at Brands For Less you can find top branded sports wear for men and women all with affordable prices، including Hoodies, Jackets, Jersey, Leggings & Tights, Shorts, Skirts, Sports Bra, Swimwear and many more.

Why download the Brands For Less App?
100% original products
Free shipping.
The newest arrivals and fashion trends.
Shop online and pick up in-store.
A fast and secure app for online shopping.
Cash on Delivery, credit card, and debit card and many more like paypal, Tabby, etc.

About Brands for Less Group:


The Brands for less Group is one of the world’s leading off-price retailers of fashion and homeware through the following companies:
Brands for Less: Brands For Less offers an unrivaled shopping experience in 11 countries, including United Arab Emirates, Lebanon, Saudi Arabia, United States of America, Philippines, India, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, Bahrain, Malta and Kuwait.


Homes for Less: Homes For Less brings off-price value and Brands For Less’ ethos of customer satisfaction to the home. With premium brands and home fashion available at up to 60% off recommended retail price, and a new selection of items to browse daily, Homes For Less has rapidly become the preferred brand for the thrifty house-proud.


Luxury for Less: Brings shoppers closer to indulgence with an impressive line-up of fashion items offered at incredible prices following the off-price retail model. With Luxury For Less, customers can expect to shop high-end Brands from the biggest fashion houses in the world like, all made budget accessible.


Toys for Less: Toys For Less extends our off-retail model to engage younger audiences. We source from 500 plus brands to ensure that there is the perfect toy at the right price for every child out there. Disney, Fisher Price, Hasbro, Jay at Play, Lego, Melissa and Doug, Toy Triangle and many more.


Tchibo: Tchibo offers scintillating affordable variety along with the brilliant element of surprise. Our in-store collections change weekly and are available only in limited quantities – creating the desire to visit again and again to discover new desirables.

Follow Brands For Less on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brandsforless/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BrandsForLess

Visit the Brands for Less website in your country:

UAE: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-ae/
Lebanon: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-lb/
Saudi Arabia: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-sa/
United States of America: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-us/

India: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-in/

Qatar: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-qa/
Jordan: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-jo/
Bahrain: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-bh/
Malta:  https://www.brandsforless.com/en-mt/
Kuwait: https://www.brandsforless.com/en-kw/

apps.title: ShopRite: Groceries & Savings
apps.description:
ShopRite, your friendly local grocery store & supermarket! Everything you need for deals, personalized recipes, and coupons for both in-store and online shopping, in one single grocery app. Order pickup or delivery, or plan your next grocery shopping list. Discover savings with our digital coupons, online promotions and the weekly circular.

Our app makes it easier to plan and shop while saving you time with these benefits:

Weekly Circular & Promotions:
• Browse and shop items on sale directly from the Weekly Ad.
• Look out for other deals and promotions. You’ll find incredible discounts on popular items, making your shopping experience even more rewarding.

Digital Coupons:
• Load additional savings directly to your Price Plus Club loyalty card to redeem at checkout.

Convenient ways to get your items:
• In-Store: Easily check items off your list while you shop, and sort them by aisle for easy in-store navigation. Quickly find a ShopRite location near you or check store hours with our easy-to-use store locator.
• Pickup: Save time with contactless, curbside service. Notify us when you’re on your way, so we can have your order ready upon arrival.
• Delivery: Get groceries delivered to your doorstep hassle-free! Add a tip for your driver when placing your order.

Saved Lists:
• Create and save shopping lists for future use, making your grocery shopping faster and more organized.
• Add personalized notes to items, ensuring your preferences and special requests are always remembered.

Scan Product Barcodes:
• Scan product barcodes to quickly view an item's product details including packaging, nutritional label or aisle location, and easily add them to your shopping list or cart.

Shoppable Recipes:
• View recipes and add ingredients to your shopping list or cart.

Personalized Offers:
• Reorder from a curated list of your past purchases and get recommended items on sale each week.
• Pre-select your substitution choices at checkout in-case an item you ordered isn’t available.

Product Assortment:
• Explore an extensive range of products, from fresh produce to pantry staples, international foods, and specialty items.
• Discover our own brands carefully curated for taste, quality, and affordability.
• Stock up on essentials with club-sized options. Whether its breakfast and pantry items, or cleaning supplies, buying in larger quantities saves you money.

Loyalty Card Access:
• Save your Price Plus Club card to your Wallet app or directly access it within the ShopRite app.

Search Functionality:
• Find exactly what you need in seconds with powerful and intuitive search for products, recipes, and coupons.

Deli and Catering Pre-Orders:
• Order cold cuts, cakes, and catering platters from our Order Express App (where available) for time-saving, customizable options, freshness and hassle-free pickup.

Pharmacy Management:
• Easily locate pharmacies, manage prescriptions, order refills and more with our Pharmacy App.
 
Download the ShopRite app and enjoy a seamless shopping experience today!

raw_data.releaseNotes: We have updated the ShopRite app to make your grocery shopping more efficient & convenient than ever! We have squashed minor bugs and improved overall app performance ensuring your online & in-store shopping runs smoothly. Download the latest update now and enjoy a smoother, hassle-free grocery shopping experience!

apps.title: Shop Online Shopping App
apps.description:
Shop App's first ever Free Delivery Festival is here!
Shop from over millions of products at the best prices possible, and get your items delivered for FREE.

Here’s what Shop App Free Delivery Festival has in store for you:[pp[

FREE DELIVERY NATIONWIDE 
Shop over millions of products from the convenience of your home, and get your items delivered for free.

EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT ON YOUR FIRST ORDER
New buyers get an exclusive discount on their first order. Download the Shop App now for more discounts.

BEST PRICES POSSIBLE
Buy your everyday needs on Shop App at lowest prices, and enjoy exclusive deals up to 80% off.

BEST PRICES, BEST PRODUCTS, SHOP NOW
• Browse and purchase from our range of categories, including health & beauty, electronics, fashion, home & living, and more
• Get 100% authentic products from official brands on Shop Mall
• Quick and convenient purchase process with our intuitive interface.
 • Transact with your preferred payment method - COD (Cash on Delivery), bank transfer, or credit card

PURCHASE WITHOUT WORRIES WITH SHOP APP GUARANTEE
• Free and easy returns: If an item doesn’t meet your expectations, return the item in just 5 simple steps within 14 days for official stores and 7 days for marketplace sellers
• Safe and secure payments: We are PCD-DSS compliant, which means all transaction data is encrypted, and the system is monitored for suspicious activity to ensure your safety
• 24/7 Live Support: Need help? We are always here for you - connect with us for any questions

***Happy Shopping! ***

If you face any technical issues, please drop us a line at customer@shop.com.mm

apps.title: Shop LC Shopping App
apps.description:
Shop LC is now mobile! Enjoy all the features you love, now on the go!
Enjoy everything you love about Shop LC, now available on your phone and tablet! Browse and buy your favorite exclusive Shop LC brands and stay trendy while on the go. Shop live with your favorite hosts, browse hundreds of listings through our online catalog, or bid, win, and save on hundreds of online auctions. With new items added daily, there’s always a reason to visit.

Key Features:

Home – Discover Today’s Leading Value! Each day, we’re offering a unique product just for you. These are the best of the best, direct from Shop LC. TLV pricing is only available for 24 hours, so act fast to save!
Shop – There’s no need to wait when shopping online! Through the app, view our entire online catalog. We’re adding hundreds of new items daily, making it even more fun to browse, shop, and save. Every purchase is backed by the Lowest Price Guarantee, so you can shop in confidence knowing you’re getting the best value.

Watch TV – Join your favorite Shop LC hosts and co-hosts for hours of fun, exciting, and educational entertainment. While you shop on the go, learn first-hand about the history and lore behind your favorite stones from our team of trained professionals.
Bid Now – Never forget an auction again! We make it simple and easy to manage your online auctions directly from the app. Enable auction notifications to avoid losing a winning bid. We’ll alert you whenever you win and even if you’re outbid!

24/7 Support – Having trouble? We want you to have the best experience every time you shop with us. Contact our Customer Service team and get the help you need. They’re available 24/7, 365 days a year to help!
Delivering Joy – Every item you purchase contributes to the Shop LC One for One Program. For each item you buy, you’re providing a meal to a hungry child in need while also contributing to on-going hunger education and outreach programs. 

New: Try-it-on feature! Powered by the technology of augmented reality (AR) and the camera on your device, you can now ‘try-on’ the jewelry virtually before you buy. Available on most new jewelry items, just click on the “TRY IT ON” button. You can also share the image with your friends, online or save it for later.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Our app just got a fresh coat of paint! With a smoother design, faster performance, and exciting new features, you’ll love the updated experience. Plus, we’ve beefed up security and squashed some pesky bugs. Let us know what you think by sharing your feedback at appteam@vglgroup.com

apps.title: MAF Carrefour Online Shopping
apps.description:
The MAF Carrefour app is your first choice when it comes to shopping for groceries, electronics, household items, appliances, personal care, beauty, and more. Choose from a very large variety of fresh foods from all around the world that are ready to be delivered to your doorstep.

Instant Shopping
Enjoy instant shopping with just a couple of taps on your smartphone with the MAF Carrefour app. You find it, you love it, and you buy it.

Fresh Groceries & Organic Food
If you don’t have the time to go running around for the item you need, you can get it on the app. Whether you are looking for fresh food, vegetables, fruits, meat, chicken or anything else, it is available for purchase. And you can also buy them in bulk.

If you want to buy electronics, you can read all the specifications and features on the MAF Carrefour app and pick the one that suits your budget and needs.

Nutritional Information for All Foods
Shopping for food online is as easy as buying it from the store. All our food products have nutritional values displayed under them on the app, so just like you read through these before you buy groceries in the supermarket, you can do the same with online shopping on our app.

A Wide Range of Products
We offer a wide spectrum of products from A to Z, starting from fruits and vegetables picked up fresh for you, food cupboard items and organic products, beauty products from well-known brands, fashion that keeps you warm in winter and light in summer, as well as health, personal care, fitness & wellness items. We also offer the best value for baby care products like wipes, diapers, baby formula, and even kid strollers and necessities to raise your angels. Enjoy online promotions and exclusive shopping deals on electronics, along with a wide range of laptops, smartphones, and large and small appliances for your home.

Go Paperless
Order your groceries online now and pay zero cash by using your Carrefour wallet to make payments. You can easily top up Carrefour Pay using your credit or debit card.

Earn Loyalty Points
With SHARE & MyCLUB memberships you can enjoy countless offers as well as earn and redeem point on every purchase.
Benefits we deliver to you:
- Mobile shopping has never been easier with our app designed for your ease of use
- Create your shopping list with the MAF Carrefour app instead of writing it down
- Get your grocery delivered in 60 min using Carrefour NOW on eligible items
- Locate all Carrefour hypermarkets and supermarkets near you with our store locator
- Available in both English and Arabic languages
- Get exclusive offers MyCLUB or SHARE membership and earn loyalty points

Buying your groceries has never been easier! Download the MAF Carrefour app today and enjoy the best online shopping experience you will ever have.

apps.title: ShopBack: Cashback & Rewards
apps.description:
Shop smarter and save more with ShopBack. Discover the best deals, pay easily and get rewarded with Cashback on your shopping. Withdraw your Cashback earnings effortlessly via PayPal or bank account (available in select markets only). Join over 45 million shoppers globally, including Germany, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Malaysia, Korea, Hong Kong, the Philippines, Indonesia, Taiwan, Thailand and Vietnam. 



Shop online and earn Cashback
Start your shopping with ShopBack, and stack your savings with online sales, coupon codes, loyalty programs, credit card miles and more at over 3,500 stores globally (number of stores will differ by country). 



**Pro-tip: Install the ShopBack browser extension on your Chrome web browser and shop online as usual. The ShopBack browser extension will find the best Cashback deals and discounts with just a click.**



Unlock extra rewards by completing shopping quests
Join and complete limited-time shopping quests to earn bonus Cashback and save even more!

Shop and pay with ShopBack (available in select markets only)
Boost your rewards and earn extra Cashback when you pay with ShopBack Pay at over 4,700 outlets, both offline and online (number of outlets will differ by country).



Purchase gift vouchers and earn Cashback (available in select markets only)
Earn instant Cashback when you purchase gift cards or vouchers in the ShopBack app for yourself or loved ones, and use them at your favorite online or offline stores.




What exactly is Cashback? Where does the money come from?

If you love shopping online, you're probably always looking for a good deal. Cashback, coupon codes and browser extensions all help you save money, and you've come to the right place!




So, what is Cashback? When you click through ShopBack to our partners, we give you a portion of your spending back. Stores pay us commissions for sending our members to their platforms, and we share that with you in the form of Cashback. It's a win-win, and a great way to earn money while shopping online! 



The best part about getting Cashback is, of course, cashing out. Get yourself some extra money to shop more! 

How do you get Cashback?


Sign up for your free ShopBack account and browse on our app, website or browser extension to find what you love.
Click through ShopBack to be redirected to the store's site. Shop, apply the coupon code that you've found on our site, and pay as you normally would. 
Cashback will be tracked in your ShopBack account and ready to be withdrawn once the store and ShopBack have verified your purchase.
Get paid via PayPal or bank account!


Stay updated on the latest ways to earn and save with ShopBack:

Website: https://www.shopback.com
Email: care@shopback.com

raw_data.releaseNotes: Shopping just gets even more rewarding with each small fix we make to our app. In this update, we’ve crushed a few bugs and made some performance and usability enhancements. So it makes your every win on ShopBack just that bit smoother.

apps.title: HSN: Shopping App for Deals
apps.description:
Shop thousands of products from your favorite brands—anytime, anywhere. The award-winning HSN Shop App puts the best electronics, cookware, home, jewelry, women’s clothing, skincare, cosmetics and more, right in the palm of your hand. Shop the latest styles and trends, find product details and read customer reviews for the products you love. 

Key Features: 
Watch Live Shows 
Livestream HSN and HSN2 wherever you go. Use the Program Guide to find upcoming shows with your favorite brands. 

Convenient Customer Service 
Call our Customer Service team and speak to a representative right from our app. 

FlexPay Manager 
Track and manage all of your current FlexPays, from anywhere you are. 

Auto-Ship Manager 
Easily manage all of your Auto-Ship orders. Skip a shipment, change frequency, update your address and more. 

Easy Checkout 
Complete your checkout with a single touch using Apple Pay. Available on iPhone 6 and above. Touch ID lets you speed through checkout, quickly and securely, with just your fingerprint. We’ll save your email address to make signing in to the app easier. Or choose the ‘Remember Me’ option to save your password, making future sign ins a breeze. 

Exclusive Savings 
Opt in to push notifications for early access to the best deals. Receive exclusive offers and coupons in your HSN Inbox.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thank you for shopping with the HSN iPhone app! Our engineers have been working hard on some enhancements and behind-the-scenes improvements to enhance your shopping experience. Love the HSN app? Please leave us a rating or review. Have a suggestion for how we can improve? Email us at hsnshopapp_feedback@hsn.net.

apps.title: ShopShops: Designer Deals Live
apps.description:
ShopShops was named the Best Livestream Shopping App of the Year by Retail Boss for 2022. ShopShops eliminates all the stressful guesswork of online shopping and instantly connects shoppers with the most coveted new, discounted, pre-loved and pre-owned designer items. On ShopShops, you can follow and interact with hosts and sellers directly to know exactly what you're buying, while taking part in instantly shoppable video streams that are always fun, timely, and genuine.

LIVE SHOPPING
Interact with live shopping shows from your favorite sellers, chat directly with shoppers and hosts, and securely purchase unique products, all without ever leaving the app. New shows are added daily, and you can follow hosts or RSVP to live streams to get notified the moment they go live.

UNLOCK UP TO $500 OF SHOPPING REWARDS
Every new shopper receives a $75 coupon to apply to the first purchase and up to an additional $500 to apply to purchases. All you have to do is complete actions like following hosts, RSVPing to live events, and commenting on live shows.

GLOBAL COMMUNITY
Join a global community to buy products from NYC, Miami, LA, Paris, Milan, Tokyo, Osaka, Madrid, London, Dubai, and more exciting cities. Including: designer bags, vintage clothes, streetwear, luxury watches, high-end jewelry, antiques, and so much more.

DEALS & GIVEAWAYS
Shop and save money with daily exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world – right in the ShopShops app. You can find deals on pre-loved and pre-owned products from brands like Luis Vuitton, Gucci, Chanel, Prada, Burberry, Rolex, Hermes, and Dior. We also host weekly giveaways and offers during our Mystery Box live event series.

BUY NOW PAY LATER
When you shop in the ShopShops app, you can pay immediately or split the cost of your purchases into 4 smaller, interest-free payments.

LEARN MORE
Whether you’re a designer and luxury lover, a beauty products collector, a home decor enthusiast, or just looking for some retail therapy, there’s something for everyone in the ShopShops apps. All you have to do is watch, and engage with what inspires you, and you’ll find an endless stream of inspirational shopping videos that feel personalized just for you. 
Follow us @shopshops_official to stay in the loop and learn about our latest partnerships and deals.

apps.title: Phia: Shop Smarter, Save Money
apps.description:
Phia allows you to instantly find the best prices in fashion. Instantly compare the best fashion prices from over 40,000 sites—saving you time and money in one click.

HOW IT WORKS:
1) Browse Anywhere: While shopping on Safari, tap the "Should I Buy This?" button.
2) Instant Price Check: Phia immediately compares the item you're viewing to real-time prices from both retail and secondhand markets.
3) Find Cheaper Options: If the item is overpriced, Phia instantly shows you better-priced alternatives—right in the app.

SHOP FROM TRUSTED SECONDHAND PARTNERS

Phia’s price comparison tool helps you save money by connecting you to the top secondhand and new deals from platforms like The RealReal, Vestiaire Collective, ThredUp, StockX, eBay, and Poshmark.

KEY FEATURES:
• Instantly compare prices as you shop online with Phia’s shopping safari tool.
• Save items to personalized collections to return to later
• Discover cheaper secondhand alternatives directly in the app.
• Shop smarter with data-driven insights, not guesswork.

DATABASE OF 250 MILLION SECONDHAND ITEMS
Phia analyzes current market trends and uses a database of over 250 million secondhand items to rate items–bringing you smarter price comparisons and bigger savings.

WHY PHIA?
Phia helps you understand whether an item's price is high or low by combining powerful AI technology with real-time market data from over 40,000 retail and resale partners:

1) Real-Time Price Analysis: Phia uses advanced AI to instantly analyze thousands of current listings and historical sales data across the web, determining the item's average secondhand and retail prices. This gives you accurate, up-to-the-minute pricing information.

2) Brand Value Insights: Our technology assesses brand performance and tracks how well items from specific brands retain value in the resale market. This provides context around the item's price, helping you understand whether it's worth buying new or if secondhand is a smarter choice.

Phia gives you the insights you need to make informed purchases and save money.

FIND DEALS ON TOP BRANDS
Phia helps you discover great deals on trending, sought-after brands like Sandro, Maje, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Hermès, Cartier, Rolex, and more.

JOIN THOUSANDS OF SMART SHOPPERS
Download Phia and revolutionize the way you shop. Make smarter purchases, save money, and support sustainability with every decision.

Phia uses an affiliate model—when you click on a product link, we may earn a small commission from the resale platform if you make a purchase. This helps us keep Phia free to use!

apps.title: JioMart Online Shopping App
apps.description:
JioMart: FREE Home Delivery on Everything + Quick Grocery Delivery!
 
JioMart now offers you the best of both worlds—quick delivery of daily essentials in minutes, and access to many more categories and exciting discounts through its Scheduled Delivery option. Shop from over thousands of products from the best online shopping app.
 
Enjoy Absolutely Free Home Delivery with No Minimum Order and Zero Extra Charges on a wide range of products, from the latest Electronics and trendy Fashion to essential Home & Kitchen items, quality Beauty products, and stylish Furniture. Plus, get your Groceries delivered super-quickly within 10-30 Minutes in select locations!
 
Also, by simply tapping the “Scheduled” option at the top of the JioMart app, you can explore a wider range of products including Mobiles, Electronics, Home & Lifestyle, Fashion and more categories—delivered within a few days with amazing deals.
 
Why choose JioMart for all your shopping needs?
• Super-Fast Grocery Delivery: Get your groceries delivered within 10-30 Minutes. 
• Absolutely FREE Delivery: No minimum order value, no extra delivery fees on all categories!
• Low Price Guarantee: Enjoy great savings on our extensive selection - 365 days a year.
• Verified and Authentic Products: Shop with confidence knowing the quality is assured.
• Pan India Delivery: We deliver across India for all your needs beyond quick groceries.
• Huge Variety: From everyday essentials to the latest trendy outfits and much more.
• Easy Shopping Experience: Secure payments and hassle-free returns. Pay using secure payment modes including Credit/Debit Card, UPI, Easy EMI's, Net banking, and Cash on delivery. No cost EMI on selected products.
• Sodexo meal card is accepted on food and beverages.
• Earn and redeem R-One loyalty points with every purchase.
• 24/7 customer support and chat for quick resolution.
 
Explore our extensive categories:

JioMart now offers you the best of both worlds—quick delivery of daily essentials in minutes, and access to many more categories and exciting discounts through its Scheduled Delivery option. Shop from over thousands of products from the best online shopping app.
 
Enjoy Absolutely Free Home Delivery with No Minimum Order and Zero Extra Charges on a wide range of products, from the latest Electronics and trendy Fashion to essential Home & Kitchen items, quality Beauty products, and stylish Furniture. Plus, get your Groceries delivered super-quickly within 10-30 Minutes in select locations!
 
Also, by simply tapping the “Scheduled” option at the top of the JioMart app, you can explore a wider range of products including Mobiles, Electronics, Home & Lifestyle, Fashion and more categories—delivered within a few days with amazing deals.
 
Why choose JioMart for all your shopping needs?
• Super-Fast Grocery Delivery: Get your groceries delivered within 10-30 Minutes. 
• Absolutely FREE Delivery: No minimum order value, no extra delivery fees on all categories!
• Low Price Guarantee: Enjoy great savings on our extensive selection - 365 days a year.
• Verified and Authentic Products: Shop with confidence knowing the quality is assured.
• Pan India Delivery: We deliver across India for all your needs beyond quick groceries.
• Huge Variety: From everyday essentials to the latest trendy outfits and much more.
• Easy Shopping Experience: Secure payments and hassle-free returns. Pay using secure payment modes including Credit/Debit Card, UPI, Easy EMI's, Net banking, and Cash on delivery. No cost EMI on selected products.
• Sodexo meal card is accepted on food and beverages.
• Earn and redeem R-One loyalty points with every purchase.
• 24/7 customer support and chat for quick resolution.
 
Explore our extensive categories:
Groceries
o Fruits and vegetables (Fresh fruits, Premium fruits, Vegetables, Herbs, Flowers)
o Dairy and Bakery (Toast and Khari, Cakes, Cookies, Bread, Cheese, Ghee)
o Staples and snacks (Atta, Flours, Dals, Edible oils, Rice, Salt, Sugar, Dry fruits, Biscuits, Noodles, Chocolates, Pickles)
o Personal and Home care (Hair care, Oral care, Skin Care, Detergents, Dishwash)
o Premium Fruits (Cherries, Berries, Exotic fruits, Dates)
o Baby care (Baby Grooming, Baby bedding set, Baby food, Baby bath, Toys)
o Books (Children’s books, Fiction, School textbooks, Non-Fiction, Exam Central)
 
Electronics:
o Mobiles (Apple, Samsung, Realme, Redmi, Oppo, Vivo, OnePlus) and Mobile accessories
o Computers, Laptops (Macbook, HP, Asus, Acer, Dell, Lenovo), and Tablets
o TV (Samsung, OnePlus, MI, LG, Sony) and Speakers
o Home Appliances (Air conditioners, Washing machines, Refrigerators)
o Cameras (DSLR, Binoculars, Photo Studio lighting)
o Smart devices (Smart lights, Smart cameras, Smart speakers)
 
Home and Kitchen:
o Bathroom and Laundry accessories (Buckets, Mugs, Tubs, Hangers)
o Disposables (Carpets, Rugs, Curtains, Cushions)
o Furniture (Beds, Dining sets, Sofas, Couches, Study Tables)
o Home Decor (Artwork, Room Decor, Clocks, Mirrors, Wall Decors)
o Kitchenware (Bakeware, Cookware, Tiffin Boxes, Gas Stove)
 
Fashion:
o Menswear (Jeans, Shirts, T-shirts, Jackets, Footwear, Watches)
o Womenswear (Western wear, Ethnic, Lingerie, Fusion wear, Jewelry, Handlooms)
o Kidswear (Jeans, Nightwear, T-shirts, Footwear, Sunglasses)
 
Beauty:
o Makeup (Lipsticks, eyeliners, Nail paints, Mascara, Creams)
o Fragrances (Deo, Perfumes)
o Maternity care (Feminine Hygiene, Baby care, Feeding bottles)
o Men’s Grooming (Shaving cream, Trimmers, Razor)
 
Sports, Toys, and Luggage:
o Toys and Games (Baby toys, Bikes, Trikes, Dolls, Building kits, Musical toys, Soft toys)
o Bags and Travel Luggage
o Sporting Goods and Fitness Equipment
 
Home Improvements:
o Auto Care supplies

o Industrial and Scientific supplies

apps.title: Stop & Shop
apps.description:
The Stop & Shop online and in-store shopping you love, now even better: easier-to-redeem Go Rewards™ Points and Bonus Offers, a dedicated "Shop" section and simpler navigation.

So. Many. DEALS.

• Shop coupons, your local weekly ad, specials and much more right from the app.
• Save it all to your account and automatically redeem in-store or online, when you checkout with your loyalty card.

And as always, Stop & Shop Go Rewards™ are waiting for you no matter how you shop.

• Sign in to access your Stop & Shop Go Rewards™ any time.
• Earn Stop & Shop Rewards points for every $1 spent online or in-store.
• Redeem points for fuel and grocery savings and special offers.
• Visit stopandshop.com for more information.

Experience the Mobile App In-Store, too

• Sign in to access your Stop & Shop card and save it to your phone's wallet. Scan the digital card in-store to use your clipped coupons and rewards.
• Experience Deli Order Ahead — stop waiting in game-day deli lines.
• Save time and bypass the checkout line with Scan It.

Your satisfaction is our #1. Our family always takes care of your family like our own.

raw_data.sellerName: The Stop & Shop Supermarket Company LLC
raw_data.releaseNotes:
Those of you with a photographic memory will notice some key messaging has been slightly adjusted. For example, the order confirmation screen just got more specific about how long you can update your order. We hope this and other copy changes across the app brings you clarity! 

Bug fixes: Our dedicated teams continue working hard to keep the bug count low and the reliability high. Where there’s a bug, there will be a fix.

apps.title: Shop Titans: Crafting Tycoon
apps.description:
YOU are the new craftsman in town. Craft, build and grow your own medieval shop into an epic fantasy empire! Personalize your shopkeeper, design your store, craft legendary items and sell them to heroes to bring back more loot. Team up with blacksmiths, tailors, priestesses, carpenters and herbalists for crafting, building, and expanding your business! 

Start by showing off your medieval style and customizing your shopkeeper. Then, dust off the accounting table, learn how to craft, design the layout of your store for optimal shopping and attract as many customers as possible! Manage your store well to become the top shopkeeper in this fantasy kingdom and build your fortune! Trade and sell products to the highest bidders and other players around the world in the open market to become the kingdom’s greatest tycoon!

Now it’s time to build up your very own store and embark on a medieval fantasy crafting and building adventure in Shop Titans!

SHOP TITANS FEATURES:

BECOME A MEDIEVAL SHOPKEEPER:
• Show off your medieval style by customizing your shopkeeper!
• Choose from an expanding catalog of hairstyles, clothes and accessories to make your shopkeeper truly stand out!
• Level up your shopkeeper to unlock new items for crafting and designs for your store!.

BUILD & DESIGN YOUR FANTASY STORE:
• Get crafting with an ever growing collection of items including swords, shields, boots, guns and much more!
• Stock your shop, sell your items to aspiring heroes, and earn money for expanding your store and growing your business.  
• Heroes of all kinds can enter your store: warriors, wizards, dwarves... even ninjas!

CRAFT, TRADE & SELL:
• Craft and sell legendary items to heroes to help them in their adventures.
• Trade and bid on items with other players and shopkeepers from around the world!
• Add a surcharge to boost your profits for your most popular items.

SIMULATION RPG:
• Recruit and customize heroes with unique skills and equipment.
• Send your heroes to battle bosses and conquer mysterious dungeons to acquire rare loot!
• Complete quests to earn rewards that will help you expand your store and create new weapons and gear.

JOIN A GUILD & COMMUNITY:
• Team up with your friends and build a prosperous town!
• Support your fellow guild members in building their shop to earn special rewards.

Build up your store and get rich by selling your items to store shoppers and players around the world on the open market. Install Shop Titans for free NOW to design, craft, and build a medieval crafting empire and in this fantasy simulation RPG! 

Note: Shop Titans is a free game which allows purchases with real money within the app.

TERMS OF SERVICE:
Please read this Terms of Service Agreement and our Privacy Notice before using our services as they govern the relationship between you and Kabam.

www.kabam.com/terms-of-service/
www.kabam.com/privacy-notice/
