apps.title: Jumia Online Shopping
apps.description:
Avoid crowds, stay safe and shop from the comfort of your home. With Jumia, you open your doors to savings and convenience!
Shop safely and conveniently online with Jumia, the largest online retailer in Africa.

So what exactly do you get with the Jumia app? 

- Daily exclusive app only Flash sales on top products
- Special Treasure hunts with guaranteed prizes
- Faster access to deals
- Exclusive app-only discounts
- Fast and Free shipping in select cities across Africa!
- Exclusive app only vouchers

With the Jumia App, shop safe and convenient online!

Download the Jumia Online Shopping App today for the best shopping experience in Africa. Great discounts, hassle free payment options, easy returns and 100% genuine items guaranteed!

From fashion to electronics, find anything you need on Africa’s largest online shopping store. Enjoy a large selection of international and local brands to choose from and shop 100% genuine products only at Jumia! 

Payment made easy with secure payment options such as cash on delivery, mobile money or pay using your credit card with our secure payment system Jumia Pay.

So you ask, what can I shop at Jumia? 
We sell millions of products, download the app and search what you are looking for. Some top items include:

- Mobile Phones & Tablets
- Laptops, Notebooks, Desktops and accessories
- Appliances, TVs, Games, Consoles, Home Theatres 
- Sporting Goods, Lifestyle products
- Fashion for all - Men, Woman, Kids & Babies
- Baby Necessities - Diapers, Skincare, Toys and all
- Health & Beauty Products - Make up, perfumes, Hair care, Oral care & more
- Home & Living - Furniture, Decor, Bedding, Kitchen Essentials
- Grocery Items & Supplies - Yes you read that right

With the Jumia Shopping App, you get:
- Customized shopping experience with a personalized feed
- Buyer protection 
- Cross-platform shopping, whether on a smartphone, a tablet or even on a desktop, Jumia app will keep all the products on your cart as long as you are logged in to your account.
- Order management from our call center, our call center will call you to inform about the status of your order
- International shopping experience from brands like  Apple, Canon, HP, Pampers, Moulinex, L’Oreal, Samsung, Tefal and many more!

Operating in more than 11 markets in Africa, the Jumia Online Shopping Application is available in Arabic, English and French. Our in-house customer service strives hard to provide you with impeccable service to all your questions in English, French, Arabic or the respective regional languages of the countries.

We always look forward to provide the best customer experience,  share your feedback with us to help us achieve that goal.

Contact us :
Algeria ==> https://www.jumia.dz/sp-contact/
Côte d'Ivoire ==> https://www.jumia.ci/sp-contact/
Egypt ==> https://www.jumia.com.eg/sp-contact/
Ghana ==> https://www.jumia.com.gh/sp-contact/
Kenya ==> https://www.jumia.co.ke/sp-contact/
Morocco ==> https://www.jumia.ma/sp-contact/
Nigeria ==> https://www.jumia.com.ng/sp-contact/
Senegal  ==> https://www.jumia.sn/sp-contact/
Tunisia  ==> https://www.jumia.com.tn/sp-contact/
Uganda  ==> https://www.jumia.ug/sp-contact/
South Africa ⇒ https://www.jumia.co.za/sp-contact-us/


** DISCLAIMER **
We have been informed that our app is fraudulently advertised by third-party advertisers, mostly in the form of fake vouchers or offers. These ads are published without our consent and we highly regret and condemn this behavior.

If you encounter any of these issues, please help us and copy the page URL found and report it to jumia.online.shopping@jumia.com with subject "Fraudulent Ad" so that we can take the ad down.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Hello Jumia Fans!

We've been working on additional fixes so that you can have a good experience with our app.

If you like these changes, please let us know by rating and reviewing us in the App Store!

apps.title: My H-E-B
apps.description:
The My H-E-B app offers new ways to save time and money, whether you shop online or in H-E-B stores.

SAVE TIME
- Convenient curbside pickup, in as little as 2 hours
- Grocery delivery, with same-day options available
- Shopping lists to plan meals and more
- In-store maps to find items fast
- Reorder your top items from your past orders
- Manage prescriptions for you and your family, including refills and delivery

SAVE MONEY
- Personalized coupons, just for you
- Redeem digital coupons online or in store
- Browse your store’s weekly ad
- Shop our everyday low prices

AND MORE
- Explore our sprawling selection of fresh food and unique products
- Discover shoppable recipes that make meal planning a cinch
- Scan barcodes at home to quickly find items online
- Pay with your SNAP EBT card for pickup and delivery

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've made improvements and fixed a few bugs to better serve Texans.

apps.title: Tom Thumb Deals & Delivery
apps.description:
Shop, save and plan your meals with our all-in-one app. Get everything you need - from fresh produce and deli orders to pet food and prescriptions - in store or for pickup or delivery. Find and save with weekly deals, coupons and offers. And, easily earn and redeem rewards as you shop. 

With our app, you can:

SHOP EASIER
Quickly add items to your list or cart based on frequent purchases, recommendations and more. View and shop from past orders at any time.

Save with deals & rewards:
Find hundreds of weekly coupons, deals and other offers. Plus, earn, track and redeem rewards as you shop.

Get convenient delivery:
Have your order conveniently delivered to your home - or to your vehicle with DriveUp & Go. Track your order status and get notifications. Check-in curbside to let us know you’re here.

Shop IN Store Mode:
Use the app in store to find items by aisle locations, then scan to check prices and deals.

Create lists:
Make the most of any order or store run by adding items to your shopping list.

Plan meals:
Make sure you get the ingredients you need at the budget you want when selecting from our delicious recipes.

TRY OUR PHARMACY:
Easily manage, transfer, and refill prescriptions for both family and pets. Access vaccines, tests, and consolidate records seamlessly. 

BUILD HEALTHY HABITS:
Monitor your nutrition, steps, sleep, and activities. Earn rewards as you eat better, move more, and stay active. 

Plus, we’re always cooking up new ways to make shopping easier and more enjoyable. Download the app and sign up or sign in with your account to shop, save and plan your next meal.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thanks for using the Tom Thumb app! We’ve made some improvements so it’s even easier for you to plan, shop and save.

apps.title: Kmart – Shop & Save
apps.description:
With millions of products at your fingertips, the Kmart app is a must-have for any savvy shopper looking for ridiculously awesome savings, coupons and special offers while on the go. 

WE’VE GOT PEOPLE TALKING 
(Five Stars)
“Great app for getting great deals on pretty much everything!”
- One of our ridiculously awesome users
"This app is perfect for online shopping. Everything was so easy to navigate. Love it"
- Another ridiculously awesome user

COOL FEATURES 
• Get $5 off any $35 purchase when you download the app
• Enjoy free shipping when you place an order on the app while in the store

• Stay in the know with notifications about order updates, tracking info and more
• Keep track of everyday essentials and save must-haves for later with our list feature
• Check out the Weekly Ad for deals and offers near you

• Take it home today with Lease It (no credit required!) 
• Save coupons to your profile for easy in-store and online use (yay, savings!)
• Manage your Layaway contracts and make payments with ease
• Find exactly what you’re looking for and see if it’s available at a store near you
• Get what you need, when you need it with free in-store pickup


Finally, an app that’s as awesome as you are. What are you waiting for?
Download the Kmart app now!


Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Finally, an app that’s as awesome as you are. What are you waiting for?
Download the Kmart app now!


Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

apps.title: Flash.co | AI-Powered Shopping
apps.description:
Flash.co – Your AI Shopping Assistant

Tired of juggling shopping apps, missing returns, or losing track of where your money’s going?

Flash is your AI-powered shopping HQ—designed to help you discover smarter, track effortlessly, and earn real rewards. Built for power shoppers who spend across categories and platforms, Flash brings all your shopping intel into one clean, intuitive space.

How It Works:
1. Download and create your profile.
2. Flash auto-syncs and organises your past purchases.
3. Track all orders, returns, warranties, & receipts in one dashboard.
4. Discover new brands and trending products you’ll love.
5. Earn Flash Points on eligible purchases and redeem easily.

How does Flash make your shopping easier?

Discover What Matters
No more endless scrolling or random ads for your next shopping adventure. Flash shows you curated products, trending collections, and brand drops tailored to your style, budget, and what’s hot right now.

Track Every Order, Return, & Refund
From fashion to food, flights to furniture — Flash tracks it all. Get real-time delivery updates, return reminders, refund statuses, and receipts in one place. No digging through emails.

Understand Your Spends
Visualise your shopping behaviour with AI-powered insights. Filter purchases by brand, platform, or category. See where your money’s going, and get smarter with every swipe.

Earn Points. Unlock Perks.
Score Flash Points on eligible purchases. Stack them and redeem for gift cards, brand rewards, and more. You shop — we make it rewarding.

Privacy is Non-Negotiable
We never read your personal or financial emails. We don’t share your data. Everything is anonymised, encrypted, and stored securely. You’re always in control.

Smarter discovery. Seamless tracking. Real rewards.
Welcome to shopping, supercharged.

Join 1M+ shoppers across the globe already using Flash.co to upgrade their shopping experience.

Need help? Contact us at hello@flash.tech

apps.title: Meijer - Delivery & Pickup
apps.description:
Shop with ease and save more; whether at home or in store! Make the most out of your shopping experience with Meijer's app using the following features:

GROCERY DELIVERY and PICKUP

– Shop online & place an order for pickup or home delivery to skip the trip inside the store!

– To get started, select pickup or delivery from your home screen and use your personalized grocery & shopping lists to start building your cart.

– No membership required, no markup on products, and you can use your mPerks coupons and rewards!

– All your order details are in the Orders section, where you can review, edit, or cancel your order.


IN-STORE SHOPPING

– If you're grocery shopping in-store, remember to scan your mPerks barcode at checkout or link your mPerks to your credit card in the Accounts section so you never have to worry about it.

– Use Shop & Scan to scan items to add them to your cart, clip associated coupons, and skip the checkout line!

– Get organized for making a trip to the store by using the shopping list.


FIND YOUR FAVORITE PRODUCTS

– Explore our selection of grocery products, such as fresh produce, meats, dairy and more.

– Shop our seasonal and holiday collections.

– Stock up on everyday essentials including household items, snacks and more!


REWARDS

– Creating an account automatically signs you up for our mPerks rewards program!

– If you qualify for a reward, we'll start it for you!

– Track your reward progress in the Rewards section and stay up-to-date by opting in to email or push notifications.


COUPONS

– Browse coupons in the coupons section or easily find them as you're building your cart. Find deals in our weekly ad and apply coupons.

– Clip coupons to redeem in store when you enter your mPerks ID at checkout or to have them apply to your pickup/delivery order.

apps.title: Taw9eel
apps.description:
Taw9eel the comprehensive application for your daily needs from the largest hypermarket in Kuwait, with delivery service within 30 minutes around the clock, Fast and Reliable! Shop from 70,000 products, 7,000 brands and 700 different categories!

Get all the essentials, such as cleaning supplies, washing powders and household supplies, pet supplies from fish and cat food and accessories, imported candy, various types of chips, and chocolates, all from one place to your front door.

Order all kinds of medicines, cosmetics, and devices for diabetics, and delivery within two hours by Pharmazone exclusively on Taw9eel.

Taw9eel also offers a wide range of clothing, sunglasses, women's bags, and other accessories. Order now to receive it on the same day with the fastest delivery of online orders.

Out of juice, chocolate, and fresh fruit? Are you missing any ingredients for one of the recipes you want to prepare? We'll be at your door with all your needs in no time! Buy your groceries, and we will deliver them within 30 minutes!

A unified and secure online payment system for all your purchases.



توصيل هو التطبيق الشامل لاحتياجاتك اليومية من أكبر متجر للتسوق الإلكتروني في الكويت، بخدمة التوصيل الفوري خلال 30 دقيقة على مدار الساعة وبكل سرعة وراحة! تسوق من بين 70,000 منتج و 7000 علامة تجارية و 700 قسم مختلف!

احصل على جميع الطلبات كمستلزمات التنظيف من مساحيق وغيرها ومستلزمات المنزل، بالإضافة إلى لوازم الحيوانات الأليفة من طعام الاسماك والكلاب والقطط والاكسسوارات، الحلوى الفاخرة، مختلف انواع الشيبس، والشوكولاتة، كلها من مكان واحد لتصلك الى باب المنزل.

يوفر التطبيق خدمة شراء كل انواع الادوية أون لاين من صيدلية فارمازون. اطلب جميع انواع الادوية ومستحضرات التجميل والاجهزة الخاصة بمرضى السكر و التوصيل خلال ساعتين.

كما يقدم توصيل مجموعة واسعة من الملابس ونظارات الشمس وحقائب سيدات وغيرها من الاكسسوارات. اطلب الآن لتصلك في نفس اليوم مع اسرع توصيل طلبات اونلاين. قم بجمع كل مشترياتك واحصل عليها بسرعة وسهولة.


ثلاجتك تخلو من العصير، الشوكولاتة ، والفواكة الطازجة؟ هل ينقصك أي مكون لاحدى الوصفات التي تريد تحضيرها؟ سنكون عند باب منزلك، مع مقاضيك، في أسرع وقت! اشتري بقالتك وسنقوم بإيصالها خلال 30 دقيقة.


نظام دفع موحد وآمن أونلاين لجميع مشترياتك.

apps.title: Flipp: Shop Grocery Deals
apps.description:
Browse thousands of weekly ads and circulars digitally with the Flipp app, and find deals from over 2000 stores including Walmart, Dollar General, Walgreens and more. Flipp makes it easy to save money on groceries, pharmacy, and other household essentials.

Download the Flipp app for free and see what’s on sale this week at stores near you.

Here’s what our users love about Flipp:

-LOCAL DEALS, ALWAYS UP TO DATE
No need to wait for paper ads to arrive in the mail. With Flipp, your weekly ads arrive on time, on the app. Flipp uses your location to find deals from stores near you — so you’re always getting relevant and dependable information.

-WIDE VARIETY OF CONTENT
In addition to weekly grocery deals, Flipp finds you deals on pharmacy, home & garden, electronics, pet supplies, and more.

-QUICKLY SEARCH FOR WHAT YOU NEED
Flipp’s powerful search feature quickly scans all available weekly ads to tell you where you can get the items you need on sale. You can also search for stores to find a retailer’s weekly ad right when you need it.

-SAVE DEALS BY CLIPPING
See a deal you like? Simply clip the deal to your shopping list, and come back to it later when you need it.

-STAY ORGANIZED WITH YOUR SHOPPING LIST
Keep track of items you need with a grocery list! Find flyer offers for items you need, right from your list. Organize your list by retailer and know what to get at each store. Add quantities to items and bring home the right amount.

-ADD FAVORITES
Add stores to your favorites to access your frequent weekly ads from one convenient tab.

-ALL YOUR LOYALTY CARDS IN ONE PLACE
Never miss out on your loyalty points and rewards. Add your store loyalty cards to your Flipp app to quickly access your cards during checkout.

-LOAD DIGITAL COUPONS
Conveniently browse coupons by store, and load coupons to your loyalty cards to save big. Flipp will tell you about available coupon matchups that can be combined with in-store offers to maximize your savings.

Download the Flipp app now to start saving on your weekly shopping!

Have any questions or suggestions? Contact us at https://help.flipp.com/

raw_data.releaseNotes: We caught a few bugs that you’re better off without, so that you can keep finding the deals you love.

apps.title: Hoods - Live shopping
apps.description:
Enjoy the comfort of your living room 
Whether you are browsing as a guest, or you already registered on Hoods, you will get the chance to explore a wide range of products and items from both local and international brands. As Hoods Live acts as a host for multiple vendors who are looking to sell their goods that vary between food, fashion, skincare, and more. 
All you gotta do is join the right LIVESTREAMING, pick your item, check out, and it will be delivered to your doorstep. 

Avoid false imagery 
One of the main reasons a lot of people completely avoid online shopping like the plague is the fact that what they buy is not by any means what they get. On Hoods Live, we give you the chance to see for yourself what the item looks like; the size, shade, and every detail in the book. You can interact with the reviewer through live chat, ask them all the right questions and make yourself at ease while you are hitting the 'add to cart button. 

100% authentic guidance during the purchase
Our reviewers will be giving you a detailed description of the item, how it's used, and who does it suits best. There will be absolutely no surprises once you get your item delivered to your doorstep, and if you change your mind about it, you can enjoy our 14 days return & refund policy. 

Virtual meet and greet
Let us tell you, our dear shopper, that this is by far the best part about our Shoppers Hood. Imagine your favorite celebrity helping you pick the right shade of lipstick for your skin tone or the best eyeshadow palette that will make your eyes pop? Well, it's true, we are doing this! Once you join the live stream, you will see your fav celeb reviewing items from the closest brand to your heart. You get to ask questions, say hi, and share your thought.

Come on, what could beat that?

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Exciting News for Our Shoppers!
Here's what's new:

-We've enhanced our livestream viewing experience for shoppers. Now you can enjoy clearer, more professional broadcasts as sellers can connect using external professional cameras. Watch your favorite sellers stream in stunning high-quality video for a more immersive shopping experience!

-We've improved our security verification system to enhance your overall app experience. These updates ensure safe and uninterrupted access to all Hoods features while maintaining the highest security standards

-We value your feedback! If you have any questions or suggestions, reach out to us.

apps.title: Birmarket: Online Shopping App
apps.description:
Are you on the lookout for an online shopping destination where you not only shop but also earn discounts and cashback on your regular purchases? Or maybe you prefer snagging all your goodies online at great prices? Well, say hello to Birmarket! The Birmarket mobile app is the ultimate super app, merging an online marketplace with a loyalty program. Inside, discover over 500,000 products from various sellers, featuring cutting-edge electronics, the latest mobile phone models, computers, top-notch home appliances, stylish clothing, home essentials, and even groceries. Plus, there are over 1000+ partners where you can score cashback.

Seamless Online Shopping Experience:
Birmarket isn't just about browsing—it's about saving big while you shop for goodies, too. Explore store deals and product catalogs tailored to even the pickiest of shoppers. Find everything from state-of-the-art home appliances to phones, computers, and more in Birmarket, all with discounts to sweeten the deal!

Explosive Discounts:
Prepare to be blown away by Birmarket's jaw-dropping discounts! From the latest mobile gadgets and innovative smartphones to cutting-edge laptops and headphones, Birmarket has it all. And with unbelievable discounts across the board, every shopper is in for a treat.

Fashion-forward Finds:
Want to elevate your wardrobe without breaking the bank? Step into Birmarket to shop for stylish apparel for a new season! Our vast selection of stylish clothing ensures you're always fashion-ready for any occasion. Whether it's trendy dresses, cozy hoodies, or chic tees, Birmarket has it all, complete with hefty discounts and store specials for your advanced online shopping experience!

Cashback Galore:
Birmarket online marketplace doesn't just stop at discounts; we also offer cashback rewards! Unlock a treasure trove of bonuses and maximize your savings on every purchase. Whether you're shopping for clothes, groceries, or the latest gadgets, Birmarket ensures your shopping spree is both enjoyable and profitable!

Welcome to Bravo Club:
In our latest update, dive into Bravo Club for exclusive discounts, store specials, lotteries, and coupons—all designed to supercharge your Birmarket experience and bring even more savings in the way you shop!

But Wait, There's More!
Get ready for unbeatable discounts and store specials with Birmarket's coupons! Head to the "My Coupons" section in your Birmarket app to claim your discounts hassle-free. Simply flash your bonus card at checkout, and watch as those savings pile up in your wallet!

Convenient Delivery Options:
Time is precious, and Birmarket gets that! Enjoy lightning-fast express delivery right to your doorstep. Say goodbye to waiting anxiously for your new phone or outfit; Birmarket online marketplace ensures your orders reach you in record time.

Flexible Payment Methods:
Birmarket online marketplace offers hassle-free payment options for all your online shopping needs, whether it's credit card, debit card, cash on delivery, or convenient installment plans. Now you can shop for gadgets, electronics, home essentials, and fashion without worrying about payment methods!

Promo Codes, Discounts, and More:
Stay in the loop with the latest promo codes and discounts to elevate the way you shop, and be the first to know about store specials on Birmarket's social media pages. From clothing to home appliances, mobile phones, and beyond, Birmarket online marketplace brings all your favorite deals right to your fingertips!

The Birmarket mobile app unlocks a world of endless possibilities in online shopping! With store specials, maximum cashback from partners, trendy fashion finds, cutting-edge tech, and more—all in one convenient app!

Plus, there are over 1000+ partners where you can score cashback.

Seamless Online Shopping Experience:
Birmarket isn't just about browsing—it's about saving big while you shop for goodies, too. Explore store deals and product catalogs tailored to even the pickiest of shoppers. Find everything from state-of-the-art home appliances to phones, computers, and more in Birmarket, all with discounts to sweeten the deal!

Explosive Discounts:
Prepare to be blown away by Birmarket's jaw-dropping discounts! From the latest mobile gadgets and innovative smartphones to cutting-edge laptops and headphones, Birmarket has it all. And with unbelievable discounts across the board, every shopper is in for a treat.

Fashion-forward Finds:
Want to elevate your wardrobe without breaking the bank? Step into Birmarket to shop for stylish apparel for a new season! Our vast selection of stylish clothing ensures you're always fashion-ready for any occasion. Whether it's trendy dresses, cozy hoodies, or chic tees, Birmarket has it all, complete with hefty discounts and store specials for your advanced online shopping experience!

Cashback Galore:
Birmarket online marketplace doesn't just stop at discounts; we also offer cashback rewards! Unlock a treasure trove of bonuses and maximize your savings on every purchase. Whether you're shopping for clothes, groceries, or the latest gadgets, Birmarket ensures your shopping spree is both enjoyable and profitable!

Welcome to Bravo Club:
In our latest update, dive into Bravo Club for exclusive discounts, store specials, lotteries, and coupons—all designed to supercharge your Birmarket experience and bring even more savings in the way you shop!

But Wait, There's More!
Get ready for unbeatable discounts and store specials with Birmarket's coupons! Head to the "My Coupons" section in your Birmarket app to claim your discounts hassle-free. Simply flash your bonus card at checkout, and watch as those savings pile up in your wallet!

Convenient Delivery Options:
Time is precious, and Birmarket gets that! Enjoy lightning-fast express delivery right to your doorstep. Say goodbye to waiting anxiously for your new phone or outfit; Birmarket online marketplace ensures your orders reach you in record time.

Flexible Payment Methods:
Birmarket online marketplace offers hassle-free payment options for all your online shopping needs, whether it's credit card, debit card, cash on delivery, or convenient installment plans. Now you can shop for gadgets, electronics, home essentials, and fashion without worrying about payment methods!

Promo Codes, Discounts, and More:
Stay in the loop with the latest promo codes and discounts to elevate the way you shop, and be the first to know about store specials on Birmarket's social media pages. From clothing to home appliances, mobile phones, and beyond, Birmarket online marketplace brings all your favorite deals right to your fingertips!

The Birmarket mobile app unlocks a world of endless possibilities in online shopping! With store specials, maximum cashback from partners, trendy fashion finds, cutting-edge tech, and more—all in one convenient app!

apps.title: King Soopers
apps.description:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the King Soopers app. It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and link your Sooper Card to access all these great benefits:

 · Create and track Pickup, Delivery and Ship orders right from the app
 · Shop an extended aisle of 1,000s of products from our trusted third-party sellers
 · Use Kroger Pay at in-store checkout – one scan applies your Sooper Card and payment
 · Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your online order
 · View your weekly ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list
 · Clip digital coupons and use them to save in-store and online
 · Get Cash Back deals to earn money on items you already buy
 · Discover even more savings with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards
 · Refill and track the status of your King Soopers Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet
 · Check your fuel points
 · Use our locator to find the closest store or Fuel Center
 · View your purchase history and use it to easily reorder your favorite products
 · Add your Sooper Card to Wallet for iPhone.

To use the King Soopers app, you'll need a King Soopers digital account. You can create one and link your Sooper Card through the app. Don't have a Sooper Card? You can add a new one when you create your digital account.

apps.title: Locker | Shopping Wishlist
apps.description:
Locker is the answer to your endless screenshots, shopping tabs, and notes app links. You can save any online product you want to your organized collections in seconds. Login to discover from thousands of shoppers’ curated Collections, invite your friends to see what they’re eyeing, create Collaborative Collections to shop together, visualize products you want before you buy them through Collages, and make a Giftable Collection so you never get a gift you don’t want. 

It's the same utility and discoverability you love from our Locker Chrome Extension now at your fingertips whenever you scroll social media or shop on any device.

How it works:

-Download our free mobile app and LOGIN if you already have a Locker account.

-SAVE any product you want by clicking “share” (box with arrow) on any product page on any online website.

-Choose the COLLECTION you want to save a product to, or even create a new one so you never lose track of your wants.

-DISCOVER what thousands of other shoppers are saving, and even search by category, brand or Locker username.

-SHARE links to your curated collections with your friends easily over text and through social media.

More reasons that shoppers love Locker:

-COLLABORATE on collections with your friends. It's perfect for planning your next girls trip or bachelorette!

-Create PRIVATE or even GIFTABLE collections. Don't leave your friends guessing, show them what you actually have on your wishlist.

-Curate COLLAGES with shoppable products. Visualize outfits or room layouts before you buy the products!

-DISCOVER new brands & amazing sales. The Locker team curates weekly shopping edits of trending products!

-Earn REWARDS for online shopping! Join our Payback program to become eligible for cashback and commissions, and you can also apply for our Locker Shopping Club to earn from shoppers you refer to sign up.

-Join a COMMUNITY of social shoppers. Locker was built by everyday shoppers for everyday shoppers, no matter your vibe or social stats.

raw_data.releaseNotes: - Bug fixes and improvements

apps.title: ACME Markets Deals & Delivery
apps.description:
Shop, save and plan your meals with our all-in-one app. Get everything you need - from fresh produce and deli orders to pet food and prescriptions - in store or for pickup or delivery. Find and save with weekly deals, coupons and offers. And, easily earn and redeem rewards as you shop. 

With our app, you can:

SHOP EASIER
Quickly add items to your list or cart based on frequent purchases, recommendations and more. View and shop from past orders at any time.

Save with deals & rewards:
Find hundreds of weekly coupons, deals and other offers. Plus, earn, track and redeem rewards as you shop.

Get convenient delivery:
Have your order conveniently delivered to your home - or to your vehicle with DriveUp & Go. Track your order status and get notifications. Check-in curbside to let us know you’re here.

Shop IN Store Mode:
Use the app in store to find items by aisle locations, then scan to check prices and deals.

Create lists:
Make the most of any order or store run by adding items to your shopping list.

Plan meals:
Make sure you get the ingredients you need at the budget you want when selecting from our delicious recipes.

TRY OUR PHARMACY:
Easily manage, transfer, and refill prescriptions for both family and pets. Access vaccines, tests, and consolidate records seamlessly. 

BUILD HEALTHY HABITS:
Monitor your nutrition, steps, sleep, and activities. Earn rewards as you eat better, move more, and stay active. 

Plus, we’re always cooking up new ways to make shopping easier and more enjoyable. Download the app and sign up or sign in with your account to shop, save and plan your next meal.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: 7-Eleven: Rewards & Shopping
apps.description:
Join. Earn. Get Rewarded.
 
SHOP & EARN REWARDS  
Get rewards points on your everyday purchases when you scan your app barcode*, then browse our rewards menu and use points to get free food and drinks. Earn faster with bonus points offers and point streaks on select snacks, drinks, and products. Don’t forget to take advantage of our punch cards to unlock additional free rewards!

FIND DEALS 
Get exclusive offers and money-saving deals on your favorite products like pizza, coffee, ice cream, donuts, snacks, energy drinks and bottled water for 7Rewards members. 

ORDER DELIVERY 
Get food, alcohol, candy, snacks, drinks, ice cream, coffee, groceries, health needs, household essentials, and more delivered anywhere you are in about 30 minutes. Super-Fast Delivery. Get your order delivered to your door 24/7. We deliver over 5000+ items including Slurpee® and Big Gulp®, coffee, pizza and sandwiches, and even beer, wine, and liquor (where available, 21 years or older of course) across major metro areas. 

FUEL SAVINGS & PRICE LOCK
Find our 7-Eleven branded gas stations and fill up on gas for less. On your first 7 trips, you'll save 11¢/gal. After that, you'll receive everyday member savings of at least 5¢/gal (varies by state). Plan your next gas station visit today with Price Lock. Price Lock secures the gas price for 4 days in a participating gas station by finding the lowest fuel prices around you and holds the price for you with Price Lock. Unlock and Re-Lock anytime and know you will always get the best price even if your locked price is higher.

7-ELEVEN WALLET 
It's easy to pay with your phone. The 7-Eleven Wallet makes checking out contactless and easy. Get started when you load your Wallet with cash, credit, debit, 7-Eleven gift cards or Apple Pay®.
   
MOBILE CHECKOUT - (AVAILABLE AT SELECT 7-ELEVEN LOCATIONS)  
With our contactless checkout, you can shop and check out with your phone. It’s as easy as scan, pay, and go. Scan the items as you shop and skip the line when you are ready to checkout. What’s more, Mobile checkout users get discounts, exclusive deals, special rewards, and rewards points on every transaction.

NOW AVAILABLE AT STRIPES STORES  
Start saving big and earning rewards points on everything you buy at Stripes stores. Redeem points for free food and drinks. Get tacos and family meals from Laredo Taco Company, beer, and groceries to go with curbside pickup at select stores.

*Points exclude services, fuel and age-restricted items including tobacco, lottery and alcohol

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
Lock in exclusive October Monthly Perks! Choose between earning 200 points when you buy an energy, hydration, or water drink in a single transaction or earning 2X points on in-store purchases.

Enjoying 7-Eleven? Leave a review. Your feedback helps us improve the app.

apps.title: Slickdeals: Deals & Discounts
apps.description:
Go where 12 million shoppers find the best deals for you!

WHY SLICKDEALS?
• Score the best products for the best prices.
• Discover millions of deals sourced by millions of people.
• Shop with confidence, knowing Slickdeals is the most trusted deal-sharing platform.

NEVER MISS A DEAL WITH DEAL ALERTS
• The best deals don’t last long. Set up custom Deal Alerts for specific products, stores and categories to get notified as soon as the deal you want gets posted.
• For example, you can create Deal Alerts for things like “laptop”, “freebies” or “shoes”, and choose how often you want to receive them.

FIND WORKING COUPONS
• Slickdeals collects the best tried-and-true coupons for smart online shoppers to score every day at thousands of stores.

GAIN SHOPPING KNOWLEDGE
• Build a lifestyle around savings with advice from the forums. Read insightful product reviews, savings stories, and learn which current products are worth all the buzz.

LEARN HOW SLICKDEALS WORKS
1. Explore deals to uncover the Community’s favorite products and prices. Search for things you need and stumble upon new items you’ll love.
2. Members find, share, vote, and comment on the best deals online every day. Engage with the community by posting new deals, following users and voting on deals.
3. Discover the thrill of the deal by combining discounted prices with the credit card offers, points, and coupons shared by others. At the end of the day, find the best prices for the best products, every time you shop.

MORE ABOUT SLICKDEALS
• Every deal is sourced by real people.
• Slickdeals is the 8th largest online shopping destination in the U.S.
• Slickdeals has over 12 million shoppers.
• In the last 20 years, Slickdeals has saved online shoppers over $10 billion dollars.

WHAT ARE SHOPPERS SAYING ABOUT SLICKDEALS?
• "Highly recommend it to anyone trying to save money." - Jose L.
• "Honest user ratings, reviews, opinions and advice. This is legitimately the best community on the web." - Micah B.
• "Slickdeals is the first place I go to see what bargains are out there; Only issue I have is self-restraint; I find myself picking up things just because the deals are so great!" - Rob B.

HAVE SUGGESTIONS?
• Send an email to iOS@slickdeals.net
• Your feedback helps make Slickdeals the best deal scoring app!

LOVE SLICKDEALS?
• Please take a moment to rate the Slickdeals app.

STAY IN TOUCH
• Website: www.slickdeals.net
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slickdeals
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/slickdeals
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/slickdeals
• Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/slickdeals
• Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/slickdeals

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Deal Detail Page Improvements
• Featured comments now glide seamlessly, and deal images look cleaner.

Faster Push Notification Opens
• No more splash screen delays when opening deals from notifications.

Improved Deal Alert Editing
• Fine-tune your deal alerts with ease.

Clickable Icons in Profile
• Jump directly to Votes, Comments, and Rep Given with a single tap.

All-In-One Online Shopping App! Built for an Ultimate Shopping Experience

Shop online exclusive deals of over 10,000 products from top-notch brands in Mobiles, Electronics, Home & Kitchen appliances, TVs, Air conditioning, Laptops, iTunes & Digital cards and other categories.

Don’t Miss a Deal!
Receive timely alerts on your Mobile – Extra Discount Coupons, Deals of the Day and Exclusive App-only offers.

Xcite Online Shopping App features: 

- Weekend Deals: Best deals for a limited time - Set at mind-blowingly cheap prices. Hurry up & grab it before they are all gone!
- Exclusive Offers: As an Xcite App user, you get access special app-only coupon codes, free gifts & stuff only you can see.
- Unbeatable Prices: We take Best Price to another level with Year Long Savings Promotions on the products you crave for crazy discounts Up to 70% slashed prices.

And the Perks Continue 

 - FREE & Express Delivery: within 1 hour, and delivery 24/7 across Kuwait.
 - Free Installation: we provide expert installation for appliances.
 - Hassle free payment methods with High Security, Visa Electron, Visa Card, Master Card. Or using the local payment method KNET.
 - Easy returns: Purchased products can be returned or exchanged within 14 days from their delivery date.
 - Skip the hassle: Pay your installments online anytime, anywhere.

Extra Stores Related Features:

 - Xcite Stores Locator: easy access to get directions via GPS. Use it to reach the nearest Xcite Showroom faster!
 - Store Pickup: Pick up your online purchases at X-cite showroom store near you.

Get Notified: Be The First to Know 
Daily Newsletter: Hand Picked exclusive deals and offers, made available everyday
App Notifications: Receive timely alerts on your phones – Daily Deals, App-only Discounts, Latest Trends and jaw-dropping deals

Keep In Touch

- Social Media: We are available on Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, Instagram, Tiktok and more
- Additionally call us on 1803535
- Get in touch with us via http://www.xcite.com/contact/

apps.title: Home Centre - هوم سنتر
apps.description:
Home Centre - Your ultimate destination for home design!
Are you looking to transform your living space into the place of your dreams? Look no further! Home Centre is the perfect app to help you bring your dream home to life. Shop now for the best deals on everything from furniture and home decor to home accessories.




Interest-Free Installments, BNPL, Credit & debit cards
Enjoy multiple payment options with interest-free installment plans, and credit & debit cards as payment options.
Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) and divide your purchases into 4 interest-free payments when using Tabby or Tamara! We also offer installments through selected banks.


Easy Returns
We care about customer satisfaction by offering a flexible return policy. We provide hassle-free returns within 14 days from the date of purchase, keeping the product's original condition.


Free shipping
We offer you free shipping on home decor and home furniture depending on the minimum amount of purchase. This ensures having all your requirements at your doorstep without any extra cost.


Join the Home Centre Family Today!
Home Centre is the ultimate companion for homeowners, renters, and interior design enthusiasts. Home Centre is constantly evolving with updates and new features based on user feedback. Download the app now to access our great offers, quality products, and more!


Wide Area Network

Shukran Loyalty Program
Shukran is Home Centre’s loyalty program designed to reward its valued customers.


هوم سنتر - عنوانك الرئيسي لتجهيز منزل أحلامك!
هل ترغب في تحويل منزل أحلامك إلى حقيقة؟ حقّق حلمك مع هوم سنتر الذي يقدم لك تشكيلة لا حصر لها من الأثاث ومستلزمات المنزل بأنماط وأسعار مختلفة. تسوق أونلاين للحصول على أفضل العروض على كل شيء بدءًا من أطقم الأثاث، والديكور، واكسسوارات المنزل. 


تقسيط بدون فوائد  

أثث منزلك بسهولة واستمتع بمجموعة خيارات سداد مرنة ومريحة مع بطاقات البنوك سواء بطاقات مسبقة الدفع، بطاقات ائتمان أو خطط تقسيط بدون فوائد. اشتري الآن وادفع لاحقًا وقسم مشترياتك على 4 دفعات بدون فوائد 
عند استخدام تابي أو تمارا. كما نقدم أيضاً إمكانية الدفع بالتقسيط المريح عبر بنوك مختارة.


إرجاع سهل
نحن نهتم برضا العملاء وتقديم تجربة تسوق مريحة ومرضية. لذا، نقدم سياسة إرجاع مرنة عند القيام بشراء المنتجات. نحن نقبل إرجاع المنتجات في خلال 14 يومًا من تاريخ الشراء مع الاحتفاظ بحالة المنتج كما هي.



شحن مجاني
نقدم لك خدمة الشحن المجاني على الأثاث المنزلي واكسسوارات المنزل حسب مبلغ الطلب. هذا يضمن توصيل جميع احتياجاتك إلى باب منزلك دون أي تكلفة إضافية.


انضم اليوم إلى عائلة هوم سنتر!
ليس لديك حساب على هوم سنتر؟ سجل الآن باستخدام التطبيق للوصول إلى عروضنا الرائعة ومنتجاتنا عالية الجودة والمزيد!
هوم سنتر هو الخيار الأمثل لأصحاب المنازل والمستأجرين وعشّاق التصاميم العصرية. نحن لا نقدم فقط خدمة التسوق أونلاين، نقدم أيضاً خدمة التصميم الداخلي للمنزل مع حلول مخصّصة للمنازل، التوصيل والتركيب والاستشارة مع فريق كبير من المتخصصين والمحترفين.


شبكة واسعة من الفروع 
يوفر هوم سنتر 76 فرعًا منتشرين في المملكة العربية السعودية، الإمارات العربية المتحدة، الكويت، البحرين، عمان، قطر، ومصر، وتتميز هذه الفروع بمواقعها المركزية. تتواجد الفروع في مواقع يسهل الوصول إليها، ويمكنكم أيضاً التسوق أونلاين والاستلام من المتجر الأقرب إليكم.


برنامج مكافآت شكرًا
يقدم هوم سنتر واحدًا من أكبر برامج الولاء في الشرق الأوسط وهو "شكراً" لتقديم تجربة تسوق فريدة من نوعها ومليئة بالمفاجآت. 




Contact us: support@homecentre.com

apps.title: SIVVI Online Shopping سيفي
apps.description:
SIVVI is the only app you need for shopping fashion in the Middle East. Find the biggest brands for the best prices, and be inspired by the latest trends and easy to shop edits for women, men and kids. Discover exclusive offers, and get your items delivered in record time with fast delivery in Dubai, same-day delivery in Riyadh and next-day delivery in many KSA and UAE cities.

Download the SIVVI app and enjoy:

• Fashion from all the labels you love including Mango, Vero Moda, Forever21, Lacoste, Nike, adidas and Puma
• An amazing selection of clothing, shoes, accessories, beauty and gifts
• Inspiring shopping edits and trend blogs
• Easy to use filters to search by your size, favourite colour and more
• Personalised recommendations based on your shopping habits
• A handy wishlist tool that enables you to save your favourite items for later
• Sale alerts and notifications so you never miss an offer
• Lots of prepaid and post-paid payment options: cash on delivery, debit card, credit card and Apple Pay
• Super-fast delivery options including same-day delivery in Riyadh and next-day delivery in many KSA and UAE cities
• FREE returns within 14 days
We always love to hear your feedback! Drop us a line at app@sivvi.com to share your thoughts and ideas.

apps.title: n11-Online Shopping
apps.developer: N11 ELEKTRONIK TICARET VE BILISIM HIZMETLERI ANONIM SIRKETI
apps.description:
Discover the n11 iPhone app, your gateway to hundreds of thousands of stores and millions of products — from fashion and electronics to groceries and automotive goods. Enjoy exclusive campaigns and special discounts, only on mobile!
Catch Daily Mobile-Exclusive Deals
Every day between 08:00 and 20:00, explore the unmissable offers section for daily discounts and find exactly what you’re looking for at unbeatable prices. With mobile-only deals that update daily, shopping has never been more rewarding!

Categories
•	Electronics Explore thousands of products from top brands like Samsung, Apple, Xiaomi, Oppo, Realme, TCL, LG, Monster, MSI, Dell, Lenovo, Asus, Acer, Huawei, Canon, Nikon, Sony, JBL, Bosch, Philips, and Tefal. Find everything from smartphones, laptops, and TVs to white goods, small kitchen appliances, cameras, and accessories — all in one place.
•	Fashion Shop shoes from Moda Flo, Lumberjack, Nine West, Polaris, Greyder, Scooter, Lacoste, and more. Discover women’s and men’s fashion from brands like Mavi, Penti, Altınyıldız, Colin’s, Avva, Hatemoğlu, Koton, Jack & Jones, Kiğılı, Levi’s, and Ramsey. Also find bags, sunglasses, and special occasion outfits.
•	Cosmetics & Personal Care From fragrances by Avon, Burberry, Dior, Giorgio Armani to hair, face, and skincare, explore a wide range of products — including salon and hairdresser essentials — all available on the n11 app.
•	Automotive & Motorcycle Browse auto accessories, tuning products, and spare parts for Volkswagen, Ford, BMW, Toyota, Audi, and more. Discover Meguiar’s and Sonax car care, TomTom and Garmin navigation devices, and tires by Michelin, Pirelli, Goodyear. Motorcycle gear from Alpinestars, Revit, Arai, and Shoei is also at your fingertips.
•	Mom & Baby Everything for mom and baby — from baby food, clothing, and strollers to health products and maternity essentials — is conveniently gathered in this category.
•	Jewelry & Watches Explore quarter, half, and full gold coins, silver jewelry, Seiko and Michael Kors watches, and diamond rings and necklaces by Altınbaş, Gülaylar, Atasay, and Ariş. Whether you're into collectibles or everyday elegance, this category has it all.
•	Sports & Outdoor Whether you're into fitness, outdoor adventures, or sportswear, find gear from Voit, Dynamic, Adidas, Nike, Puma, The North Face, Columbia, Lafuma, and more. Also shop fishing, hunting, cycling, and marine equipment easily from the app.
•	Books, Music, Movies & Games Dive into video games and consoles by Sony and Nintendo, toys from Lego, Hasbro, Mattel, drones from DJI, books from Pegasus and Epsilon, and stationery from Faber-Castell, Bic, Edding, and Noki.
•	Home & Living Discover everything for your home — furniture, decor, lighting, home textiles by Taç, Merinos, Saray Halı, kitchenware by Schaffer and Korkmaz, and even construction supplies from 3M and Bosch.

App Features
•	Safe & Secure Payments
•	Easy Returns
•	Access to Best Sellers
•	Daily Unmissable Offers
•	Instant Discounts

apps.title: Tata CLiQ Fashion Shopping
apps.description:
WELCOME TO TATA CLIQ FASHION 

 

A place where style meets substance, and every click is a step towards defining your narrative. TATA CLiQ Fashion is more than just a fashion shopping app - we are enablers of style for consumers who crave authenticity, expression, individuality, and impact. 

 

From curated collections from over 4000+ brands and the hottest trends to cutting-edge features, everything is designed to celebrate YOU. 

 

Download TATA CLiQ Fashion App to: 

 

Discover Your Style 

 

Explore curated edits for women, men, and kids, with collections that are on-trend for every occasion. From new season launches to exclusive collaborations, find pieces that are as unique as you are. Choose from smart casual wear by brands like U.S. Polo Assn., Jack & Jones, and ONLY, or browse occasion-ready ethnic wear from Fabindia, Biba, and Westside. Complete the look with stylish and trendy footwear from top brands like PUMA and ADIDAS that blend comfort with contemporary flair. 

 

Shop Smart 

 

Navigate our expert curation of brands chosen for their commitment to quality, authenticity, and innovation. Whether it’s casual wear for men and women or standout pieces for special occasions, we’ve got styles that speak to you. Use intuitive filtering options to discover looks that reflect your vibe. With our app, you can also find beautiful home decor online that adds warmth and character to your space. 

 

Buy Effortlessly, Every Time 

 

We guarantee 100% original products, hassle-free returns, secure payments, and EMI options. Browse across categories, from fashion and beauty to footwear, and earn NeuCoins as you shop! 

 

Dress With Purpose 

 

We believe in the power of individuality, the beauty of diversity, the foundation of tradition, and the necessity of sustainability. Our vision is an inclusive future where fashion is not just worn but lived, and enable that with expert-approved curations tailored for every occasion and season. Through expert curation and deep industry insight, TATA CLiQ Fashion brings this vision to life - championing makers, materials, and stories that truly matter. 

 

Experience Innovation 

 

Tailored to your taste, our personalised updates make shopping effortless and interactive, offering a customer journey that’s seamless and suited for you.  

 

Stay Ahead of Trends 

 

Receive updates on the latest arrivals, exclusive drops, and must-have pieces in real-time. From trend playbooks to access to style insiders, our app keeps you connected to the latest in fashion. Stay clued in on everything from streetwear and timeless men’s shirts by Arrow, Van Heusen, and Allen Solly to women’s must-haves like chic dresses and effortless tops from global brands like Calvin Klein Jeans and Guess. Browse this season’s most-wanted handbags online, that are both functional and on-trend. 

 

Get Inspired 

 

Join a community of fashion fans. Whether you’re building a look for today or finding inspiration for tomorrow, the TATA CLiQ Fashion app brings you closer to your style goals.  

 

Step Into The Future 

 

Backed by a legacy of excellence, we come from the TATA Group, renowned for its dedication to quality, integrity, and innovation. Our foundation is strong, our ambitions boundless. With decades of expertise, culture-defining successes, and a forward-thinking approach, we blend tradition with the cutting-edge to offer you the best of both worlds. And with TATA CLiQ Fashion as the official online shopping destination for Westside, your favourite pieces from the trusted high-street favourite are now just a click away. 

 

Your Wardrobe, Redefined 

 

Download the TATA CLiQ Fashion app and redefine what style means to you. From everyday staples to statement pieces, this  shopping app makes style simple. Each click is more than a choice - it’s a step toward expressing who you are.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Welcome to Tata CliQ Fashion – where style meets substance, and every click is a step towards defining your narrative. From curated collections and must-have brands to style guides and loads of inspiration, you can expect an enhanced trend and fashion focused shopping experience.

apps.title: Receipt Hog: Shopping Rewards
apps.description:
Get real-money rewards for every purchase you make with the Receipt Hog app! Whether you shop online or in-store, just upload receipts and start earning. It’s as easy as that!
 
So what are you waiting for? Turn everyday shopping into rewards and savings. Any purchase, any store, any time with Receipt Hog!
 

HOW TO GET THE MOST FROM RECEIPT HOG:
 
1. 	First thing's first - download Receipt Hog! 
2. 	Check out the new Welcome Bonus for easy ways to start earning.
3. 	Recently shopped in-store? Snap and submit a photo of any receipt from the last two weeks.
4. 	If you prefer shopping online, simply connect your email account for easy receipt uploads. Share only the receipts you want to. 
5. 	Track all your receipt uploads in one place for easy budgeting or returns. No more paper receipt wads in wallets and purses!
6. 	Link your Amazon or other loyalty accounts like Walmart, Target, and Costco to earn automatically!
7. 	Share feedback with your favorite brands and retailers through surveys and questionnaires catered to you.
8. 	Enter monthly sweepstakes for a chance to WIN BIG!
9. 	Redeem your earnings for real-money rewards from PayPal, Visa, or Amazon.

apps.title: Four | Buy Now, Pay Later
apps.description:
FOUR MAKES ONLINE SHOPPING SIMPLE, FLEXIBLE, AND REWARDING.
Buy now, pay later at hundreds of online retailers. Split your purchase into 4 easy payments—paid every two weeks—so you can shop what you love while staying on budget.
Manage every order in one shopping app and enjoy a faster, smoother checkout experience. Upgrade to Four+ for access to exclusive stores, special offers, and more ways to shop online.

WHY SHOP WITH FOUR?
• PAY IN 4 INSTALLMENTS
Split payments over time with clear schedules so you know exactly what’s due and when.
• FLEXIBLE PAYMENT PLANS
Stay on budget with predictable due dates and helpful payment reminders.
• ONE SHOPPING APP FOR EVERYTHING
Browse partner stores, track orders, and manage your payment methods in one place.

HOW FOUR WORKS
1. DOWNLOAD the Four shopping app and sign up in minutes.
2. SHOP ONLINE at your favorite Four partner retailers.
3. SELECT FOUR AT CHECKOUT to split your purchase into 4 payments.
4. PAY EVERY TWO WEEKS — your first payment today, the rest in 2-week intervals.

WHY USERS CHOOSE FOUR
• Quick and easy sign-up process
• Access to hundreds of online shopping options
• Manage your installment plans and track spending
• Get notified before each payment is due
Works with top online retailers for a seamless checkout

DOWNLOAD FOUR TODAY and discover a better way to shop online—buy now, pay later in 4 installments, and stay in control of your spending.

Users must be 18 or older, a U.S. resident, and meet additional eligibility requirements. Not available in NM.

By using the Four app, you agree to Four’s User Agreement and Privacy Policy.

https://www.paywithfour.com/legal/user-agreement

https://www.paywithfour.com/legal/privacy-policy

apps.title: Randalls Deals & Delivery
apps.description:
Shop, save and plan your meals with our all-in-one app. Get everything you need - from fresh produce and deli orders to pet food and prescriptions - in store or for pickup or delivery. Find and save with weekly deals, coupons and offers. And, easily earn and redeem rewards as you shop. 

With our app, you can:

SHOP EASIER
Quickly add items to your list or cart based on frequent purchases, recommendations and more. View and shop from past orders at any time.

Save with deals & rewards:
Find hundreds of weekly coupons, deals and other offers. Plus, earn, track and redeem rewards as you shop.

Get convenient delivery:
Have your order conveniently delivered to your home - or to your vehicle with DriveUp & Go. Track your order status and get notifications. Check-in curbside to let us know you’re here.

Shop IN Store Mode:
Use the app in store to find items by aisle locations, then scan to check prices and deals.

Create lists:
Make the most of any order or store run by adding items to your shopping list.

Plan meals:
Make sure you get the ingredients you need at the budget you want when selecting from our delicious recipes.

TRY OUR PHARMACY:
Easily manage, transfer, and refill prescriptions for both family and pets. Access vaccines, tests, and consolidate records seamlessly. 

BUILD HEALTHY HABITS:
Monitor your nutrition, steps, sleep, and activities. Earn rewards as you eat better, move more, and stay active. 

Plus, we’re always cooking up new ways to make shopping easier and more enjoyable. Download the app and sign up or sign in with your account to shop, save and plan your next meal.

apps.title: Karma | Shop smarter
apps.description:
Karma: Your Ultimate AI Shopping Hub

Welcome to Karma, the next-generation shopping browser with a built-in AI assistant, designed to revolutionize your online shopping experience with ease and fun!

* Smart Wishlist & Alerts: Manage your dream wishlist and stay updated with alerts for price drops, low stock, and sale events.

* The K Button – Your Shopping Powerhouse: Compare products, track prices, and discover store insights, including shipping info, coupons, and trending items, all with a simple click.

* Intuitive Navigation & Multi-Tab Browsing: Seamlessly move between stores with our user-friendly interface, giving you a vast mall experience in your pocket.

* Enhanced Search & Personalized Feed: Effortlessly find what you’re looking for with an enhanced search feature and a feed tailored to your style.

* AI-Driven Shopping: Share a post from Instagram or TikTok, and watch Karma’s AI quickly find items for you.

* Price Tracking and Coupon scanner: Automatically find the best discounts and get notified when prices drop, ensuring you always buy at the perfect moment.

Join Karma today to make your shopping smarter, easier, and more enjoyable!

Karma’s Safari extension just got even better!
Now you can easily save items directly from Safari and claim your cash back with one click. Enjoy a smoother shopping experience with improved performance and seamless navigation. Update now and start saving effortlessly every time you browse!

apps.title: Popshop.live - Video Shopping
apps.description:
Popshop.live: Your New Shopping Addiction!


SHOPPING


Swipe, discover, and shop all in one app! Popshop.live is your go-to for the freshest fashion, beauty, collectibles, home goods, and kawaii. Swipe through endless shoppable videos from your fave creators and snag the latest must-haves. You also get to join live-streams with your favorite Creators and interact with them while you shop. With secure payments via credit cards or Apple Pay, shopping has never been this easy. Plus, new creators and thousands of new products drop daily! Follow your favorite creators, get instant notifications when they drop new items, and even create video reviews to earn some sweet referral commissions.


SELLING


Creators, we’ve made it super simple for you! Sign up in under 5 minutes and set up your e-commerce storefront in just 15. Choose from our massive catalog of over 100,000 products to sell from, or add your own unique finds from your own sourcing. We handle order management, fulfillment, customer support, automatic tax collection, and more. Getting paid? Piece of cake! Just transfer your earnings from your PSL account to your bank. Payments are automatic every 2 weeks.


GAMIFICATION


Make shopping a blast! Send gifts to friends while watching live streams together, or join the live stream on-camera with a single click. Collect badges, unlock special offers, and snag exclusive products. Sellers ramp up the excitement with our timers, offers, giveaways, and auction features. Create that FOMO and watch your sales skyrocket!


LEARN MORE


Stay in the loop by following us on Instagram @popshoplive. Don’t miss out on the fun!

TL;DR:


Popshop.live is the ultimate shopping and selling app for fashion, beauty, and collectibles, complete with gamification features and seamless payment options. Join the fun and start shopping or selling today!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Improved checkout experience
- Improved Apple Pay experience
- Improved store pickup experience
- Support storefront pickup purchases
- Bugfixes and other improvements

apps.title: Takealot - Mobile Shopping App
apps.description:
Shop online with Takealot, South Africa’s #1 shopping app and get your order delivered to your door with safe, contactless delivery, or collect at a Takealot Pickup Point at a time and place that is convenient to you! 

Find amazing savings on everyday essentials, groceries, sports equipment, body and hair care, tech and more! Get everything you need delivered from one shopping app.

Buy great products at great prices through one simple, secure online shopping experience. Find great deals on pet care, toiletries and get your groceries delivered safely and securely.

Browse millions of products across 28 departments from household cleaning, baby care, and coffee essentials to electronics, books, gaming and first aid - plus much, much more. Shop around and save items you want to custom lists for later. Essentials for mom and baby are available at our every day low prices.

Shop for kids toys like Lego, Fisher Price and Barbie. Or, shop for the whole family and buy board games for hours of fun!

apps.title: KCL: Coupons, Deals & Savings
apps.description:
This coupon app is a must-have for finding in-store and online deals for places like Target, Walmart, Kohl’s, and more. Our team of money-saving experts find and post deals, coupons and offers at your favorite places to shop. No bots here. Whether you’re just learning how to coupon or you’re an avid extreme couponer, this is an essential money-saving app. 

We’ll teach you how to find major savings on everything you buy.. Set up deal alert notifications and you’ll know when to jump on a deal on 50+ brands! We’re also tracking big box retail categories, finding you coupons & deals at: 

- Amazon
- Macy’s
- Costco
- Walgreens
- Best Buy
- Target
- Walmart
- Victoria’s Secret
- Kohl’s
- CVS & CVS Pharmacy
- Kroger
- Rite Aid
- Publix
- Safeway
- Family Dollar
- Dollar Tree
- Dollar General
And DOZENS more!

See ALL the available coupons and rebate offers. Find grocery deals, promo codes, sunday newspaper coupons, online coupons, manufacturer coupons, cash back rewards, ebates and more — we then send you deal alerts directly to your phone right when it happens. From printable coupons to e rebates. Whether you want to clip the Sunday paper or digital coupons, our Krazy team does all the work for you!

Maybe you want to learn how to use the Walmart grocery, Ibotta, Target app, or other apps for groceries? If you need to save on groceries, everyday household products, back-to-school, or diapers, we got you. If you need price comparisons for retailers on Black Friday, we got you. We will show you how step-by-step. In addition, we will coach on finding deals with other money saving apps, such as Paribus, Retail Me Not, Groupon & more. Heck we even have a Couponing Challenge class that will teach you how with live help from our founders. 

You want to save money and shop smart, but you need a deal finder. Yep. We get it.

Other freaking brilliant things about us:

- 100’s of deals posted every day with easy-to-follow instructions
- Change which brands you track and never miss a deal in the notifications center
- A constant stream of money-saving tips, tricks and life hacks
- The ability to select your favorite retailers and filter deals by store favorites
- Tutorials and videos to help turn beginning couponers into money-saving machines
- “Brags” section where you can share your successes with our community
- We have you covered from Black Friday Ad leaks to our cheat sheet
- Shopping tips from Birthday Freebies to Restaurants Hacks

Hey, friends don’t let friends overspend. Shop, save and share. Let’s get Krazy! Download the Krazy Coupon Lady app today.

apps.title: Nykaa Fashion - Shopping App
apps.description:
Nykaa Fashion Online Shopping App is your go-to online shopping app in India to get your hands on the latest luxury collections. Your one-stop destination to luxurious shopping, Nykaa Fashion App offers you curated clothing and accessories collections!
With the Nykaa online fashion shopping app, discover the most iconic brands online. Enjoy the ease of being able to browse and buy from anywhere at any point in time with the Nykaa shopping app. Get products delivered at your doorstep, shop from our made-to-order range and get apparels made exclusively for you, enjoy easy exchange and return policy for many styles online, get notified for seasonal promotions, sales and surprise discounts on designer apparels, all at Nykaa Fashion online store.

Nykaa Fashion Online Shopping App offers:-
With 250+ renowned and emerging brands across clothing apparels, jewellery, footwear, lingerie, etc. Nykaa Fashion online shopping app offers you a curated edit of your favourite styles in contemporary and ethnic fashion that are 100% authentic and are directly scoured from the brands!

Ethnic wear collections
Come indulge in a variety of ethnic wear collections at Nykaa Fashion, the best ethnic wear shopping app for women. From wedding lehengas to sarees, kurtas to dresses, gowns to salwars sets to trousers and palazzo pants, you can find it all at our online fashion store. Trust us when it comes to designer ethnic collections for women online shopping apps as we are one of the best online shopping apps in India.

Contemporary wear collections
When you shop at Nykaa Fashion, one of the best clothing apps, you never have to crib about low varieties and same old stuff at overpriced rates. Get the best of women’s fashion online, by Label Ritu Kumar, AND, Global Desi, Alaya by Stage3, AM:PM, Varun Bahl and many more only at Nykaa Fashion App. And what’s even more exciting is that you can get these collections at amazing prices, while the offers and sales seasons go live on Nykaa Fashion, the best shopping app for IOS.

Jewellery collections
From ethnic jewellery to fashion jewellery, you can now surf it all effortlessly with the Nykaa Fashion app, the best online jewellery shopping app in India. With fresh collections being updated every week on the app, get your hands on the latest designer jewellery pieces from brands like Tribe by Amrapali, Misho, Pipa Bella, SIA, Studio Kassa, Zohra, and many more at Nykaa Fashion.

Footwear collection
The best ladies footwear app online, Nykaa Fashion brings your both ethnic as well as contemporary footwear collections varying across different styles and trends. Discover a variety of collections from brands like Colaba Causeway, INOCHHI, OCEEDEE, ZTOES, Vareli Bafna and many more.

Handbags collection
Come and explore from the varied range of handbags collection with the Nykaa Fashion online shopping app. Choose across 500+ products from brands like Adora by Ankita, Baggit, Caprese, Eske Paris, ESBEDA, Hidesign, Inai, and many more.

App Features:
 • Choose from our curated edit of over 250+ designers and brands for your favourite style in contemporary and ethnic fashion.
 • Keep yourself updated in the world of fashion with Nykaa Fashion app PUSH NOTIFICATIONS.
 • Save the items that you loved the most to your own Wishlist collection. Simply tap the HEART ICON.
 • Easy exchange and return policy at Nykaa Fashion for many styles.
 • Enjoy flat 10% off on your first order with the Nykaa Fashion app.
 • Browse through Style Files – Nykaa Fashion blog, to know more about the latest trends in fashion. Specially curated styling tips by our experts, Style Files gives you a deeper insight on what’s in vogue now. From celeb styles to how-to files, you can find it all here at the Nykaa Fashion blog.

Make this online shopping app your go-to app to get your hands on the best and the latest designer collections. Download Nykaa Fashion online shopping app today to enjoy many of its benefits!

apps.title: Belk
apps.description:
Reimagine department store shopping with the Belk app: your source for shopping, rewards, and deals on everything from men’s and women’s fashion to home goods. Browse thousands of styles, see offers and coupons, and pick out that perfect something today, all from the comfort of your phone! 
The Belk app offers a wide variety of fits, sizes and styles in every category — from men’s, women’s and kids’ clothing and shoes to handbags and other accessories. Plus, shop a wide selection of designer fashion, cosmetics and fragrance. You can even save your favorite products to purchase later. Please leave us a review and let us know about your experience! Brands You Love Shop the newest men’s and women’s fashion, shoes and accessories from brands and designers like: 
· Levi’s
· Polo Ralph Lauren 
· Michael Kors 
· Free People 
· Vans 
· Tommy Hilfiger 
· Vince Camuto 
· UGG® 

You’ll also find designer watches and other accessories from brands like Movado, Bulova & Skagen and the best in beauty from Estée Lauder, Clinique and more. 

Never Miss a Deal 
Get push notifications on your phone and be the first to know about great deals, offers and our latest coupons. You can earn and redeem Belk Bucks when you shop in the app, too!

Manage Your Rewards 
Manage your Belk Rewards credit card account easily from the app. Plus, see how many Belk Reward Dollars you have available to spend and apply them at checkout for savings you’ll love. 

Quick & Easy Checkout 
We’ll save your checkout information, so all you have to do is enter your security code to complete your purchase. You can also pay with PayPal! 

Free Store Pickup 
If you have to have it today, you can! Shop in the app, add products to your bag and choose the “Free Store Pickup” option for eligible items. Your purchase will be available at your local store within a few hours — for free, of course! 

Effortless Gifting 
Check out our Gift Guide to shop department store gifts by recipient, interest, occasion and more! We’ve picked out the most-wanted products for everyone on your list and every event on your calendar.

Registry Love 
Create and manage your wedding registry easily inside the Belk app. Browse and add items from your favorite home brands, or scan and add items to your registry right from your smart phone. You can also maintain multiple registries and quickly update your gift list.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thanks for using the Belk app! Here are our latest updates:
	•	Bag Refresh: Edit product in line item
	•	Save for Later feature in bag 
	•	Tons of Performance improvements and bug fixes
We’d love to hear from you! Contact us at belk_customer_care@belk.com

apps.title: DODuae Women's Online Shopping
apps.description:
Welcome to DOD, the ultimate online shopping platform in the United Arab Emirates! Founded in 2015, we have become a trusted destination for over 1 Million satisfied customers who value high-quality products, fast delivery, and unbeatable prices. Our dedicated team is passionate about the world of e-commerce and is always up-to-date with the latest technology trends.

Discover the DOD difference as we offer the lowest prices on our website doduae.com. By sourcing products directly from trusted suppliers worldwide, we cut out intermediaries and pass the savings onto you while maintaining the highest quality standards. Our commitment to exceptional value without compromising on quality sets us apart.

But our commitment to you doesn't end with the sale. At DOD, we prioritize customer satisfaction and provide excellent support even after your purchase. Our highly trained customer care department is available via Facebook, Messenger, WhatsApp, and Voice from 8:00 AM to 08:00 PM to assist you with any queries or concerns.

Browse through a wide range of products available on doduae.com, including women's fashion, men's fashion, household items, kids' items, jewelry, makeup, and accessories. With our affordable prices, you can enjoy shopping for all your needs in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Ajman, Al Ain, and other major cities in the UAE.

Our aim is to provide a seamless and affordable shopping experience, curated with innovative and fashionable products that promise exceptional quality. When it comes to delivery, we offer the quickest and most timely service in the UAE, with a maximum delivery time of 48 hours from the date of purchase. Place your order before 3:00 PM, and we guarantee delivery on the next working day (excluding Sundays and public holidays).

Payment is made easy with both Cash on Delivery (COD) and Card Payments (Debit/Credit cards) accepted. We strive to provide a seamless and hassle-free payment experience for your convenience.

Download the DOD app now and start enjoying a seamless shopping experience at your fingertips. You can also visit our website at www.doduae.com, follow us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/doduae, Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/doduae, and TikTok at https://www.tiktok.com/@doduae for updates on the latest trends, exciting deals, and exclusive offers.

DOD - Your gateway to affordable, stylish, and satisfactory online shopping in the UAE.

apps.title: Shop Your Way
apps.description:
Shop Your Way app is your shortcut to shopping rewards. Shop & save money on your everyday essentials, earn points back, and get rewards for the brands you love, without the hassle. 
 
Help in your hand 
Shop Your Way is the way to stack up Shop Your Way points as you spend on your everyday purchases. 
Turn your everyday spending – on everything from gifts to groceries – into rewards that delight and deliver real convenience. 
No need for coupons, keeping and scanning receipts, or extra headspace. 
Just points that add up to rewards you actually want – directly on your phone. 
 
Transform your Shop Your Way points into gift cards, a fresh pair of sneakers, free delivery on your next night in, or the latest in entertainment.
 
Redeem points for cash back as gift cards with the brands you love or for popular products on shopyourway.com.
 
Maximum Rewards. Minimum Effort
Shop Your Way members earned one billion dollars in rewards and saved over 32 million minutes through our extensive community of members, partners, products, and services.
 
Not your average rewards app
While other apps can take extra effort to manage, at Shop Your Way, we know you don’t have time for that. We do the work for you and organize your rewards in one simple-to-use space.
 
Choice is a powerful thing 
Gain control of your rewards like never before by selecting only the offers from the brands you want, when you want. Save points to splurge on yourself, or treat friends and family to gift cards whenever you’re feeling generous. Whether you want your points to turn into gift cards at Crate & Barrel, Grub Hub, Home Depot, Spotify, or any of our 100+ in-demand brands.
 
Wherever you are, Shop Your Way has your back. To provide value to our members, we’re always developing new everyday partners, locations, brands, and perks to make our rewards as rewarding as possible. 
 
Shop Your Way is rewards re-imagined.

apps.title: Blinkit: Grocery in 10 minutes
apps.description:
Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

Update your app now and give it a spin!
